This product definitely does what it says. Works wonderfully to break up makeup or anything else on your skin, and leaves it moisturized after you wash it off. The carbonated bubbles feel awesome, but if you leave it to bubble too long you will have a serious load of bubbles on your face. (Not necessarily a bad thing though, just funny) It says you should use the spatula provided to apply it to your face. This mask bubbles up very quickly, so I've taken to just getting a scoop, putting it on my fingers and applying the mask to my face. Much easier and gets more even coverage.

reviews.review_header: IF YOU HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN, PROCEED WITH CAUTION.
reviews.review_text: I just it for the first time last night and although I wished for a different outcome, it was not all that pleasant for me The instant it started to foam, my cheeks and forehead started to sting a bit. I figured, "suck it up and let it work a bit...it's probably just tingling from the foam." However, after only 3 minutes, I had to wash it off. I washed it off with COLD water because my face felt like it had been sun burned. It took a while to get off because the clay pack is legit. Certain parts of my face did feel smooth, but overall, I can't use this for my whole face. I'll likely keep using it for just my nose area where the blackheads are the most prominent, but will keep it away from my more sensitive areas.

So far I've only used this mask once, so I can't say if it works wonders. But it definitely made my face feel very clean and refreshed. Left my face feeling a tiny bit tight afterwards as well. The only thing that might concern some is that it did leave my face a little red. Mostly in the cheeks. But this goes away and is nothing to be worried about. I'm very happy with my purchase and I hope to see a nice change in my skin.

My daughter received this as a gift for her birthday. She left it on my bathtub ledge, so I gave it a go. I enjoyed the scent, and even more than that, the sensation of the bubbles so much, I ordered my own! My routine is to soak in a bath, or use my facial steamer for a quicker version, lather up, and relax while it gets to fizzing. I add a little facial oil afterwards, and my skin is softer for days after. I don't indulge in beauty products like some, but this is something quick and easy to pick me up very now and again.

reviews.review_header: Very good at cleaning out pores
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! It truly works to clean deep into the pores with all the bubbling I use it about once a week and it really clears out dirt. It's also just fun to use lol I definitely do recommend this for anyone who has a problem cleaning out their pores. It's not a peel off so all you do is rinse it off and you feel your skin very smooth and clean. Thanks!
Love it! It's a fun mask to use too! Came very quickly, despite the delivery date! Will perchase again!

reviews.review_header: Overall a fun and effective clay mask!
reviews.review_text: Initially, I bought it for the bubbles but after using it for a while, I noticed it does make my skin look brighter and I feel my face become a little tighter. I try to use it on my nose often because it's good for minimizing pores. And for ~$10, you definitely get more than 10 uses of this mask compared to the 10 sheet masks for ~$10! The only issue is it's a little hard to take off. What I try to do now is to wash off as much as I can first and then I just scrape off (with my finger, not fingernail) the extra mask that's on my face.

reviews.review_header: Smells good, and it's a fun mask because it bubbles ...
reviews.review_text: Smells good, and it's a fun mask because it bubbles up. It's difficult to take off, you have to keep removing it for like 3 minutes with really warm water. And yes it leaves my face soft but doesn't make a difference with acne prone skin, nor whiteheads and blackheads. I didn't repurchase.

reviews.review_header: From all the great reviews on this product
reviews.review_text: From all the great reviews on this product, I was expecting it to be the holy grail of skin care. It's easy to apply and comes with a small scraper which makes it easy to apply evenly. It bubbles pretty quickly after applying and it leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth. I wouldn't recommend this product as I feel there are better face masks out there that do a better job but this mask wasn't awful. It's quick and easy so that you can't make an excuse to deviate from your skincare routine.

reviews.review_header: My skin feels awesome too. Pro tip though
reviews.review_text: This may be the funniest looking face mask ever! My skin feels awesome too. Pro tip though, once you are done laughing at yourself, get in the shower to rinse off. It is very thick and I made quite the mess getting water all over my bathroom while laughing hysterically at myself, while trying to take this off lol

Let me start this out by saying this is a very novelty product. It fizzes up and makes you look like the Orc who killed Boromir in lord of the rings, which I enjoyed. It didn't irritate my sensitive skin, didn't make me break out, and my skin felt very soft and smooth after using it, which are pluses. The problem is I didn't see any improvement in the state of my pores after using the product. If you have dry skin this might exacerbate the issue, but I saw the skin on my oily t-zone was much less oily after using it. I was hoping this would help remove blackheads as other reviewers had claimed, but that simply didn't happen.

This is a really fun concept for a mask and I do feel that it makes my skin softer. However, it's so bubbly and foamy it seriously tickles! Like to the point where I don't use it as much as I would otherwise. I suppose that's to be expected with a product that bubbles and expands on your face but it kind of makes it more of a novelty than a product that I would purchase and use again and again. Still fun though!

NOT for use with rosacea skin. I had read many reviews and heard the hype on this. Since it seemed to be focusing on the natural ingredients and I do have better luck with those, so I gambled and bought it. At application, it tingled. Okay, so far so good. However, the smell of it was overwhelming to me (like a fake perfume ingredient, not a natural ingredient). As it sat on my skin, my skin started to burn. I tried to wait the five minutes, but couldn't. The coating it leaves after you rub the bubbles down (as recommended) was difficult to wash off. Since my face was burning so much, washing it off felt like it was taking forever. After getting it off, my skin did feel soft, but I had a neon red flush across my skin like it had given me a chemical burn, and the areas where the rosacea is worse on my face were deep red. I immediately put my soothing toner and hydrating lotion on, but it has been over 30 minutes and my face is still hot to the touch and looks scalded. I have very sensitive and fair skin, and this is a definite no-go for me. The reason I did not give one star is because it did make my skin feel softer, so it may be more beneficial to people without such sensitive skin.

reviews.review_header: This is SO much fun to use and I'd recommend it for that reason ...
reviews.review_text: This is SO much fun to use and I'd recommend it for that reason alone (the pictures will be hilarious), but honestly I didn't notice enough of a difference in my skin to make this a regular product in my arsenal of beauty products.

reviews.review_header: It is really cool and fun to do
reviews.review_text: It is really cool and fun to do. It makes my skin feel a little tingly, possibly working its way to the pores. After it bubbles up, you can rub around for extra exfoliation. This mask works pretty fast, so I don't leave it on too long. Maybe 5-10 min max. I don't know if leaving longer makes any difference. I really like the bubbling effect. After washing it out, my skin feels very smooth. The little downside is that it does take a little longer to get all of the stuff out of skin, you can still feel slippery unless you wash really well. Overall, I enjoy using it!!!

I haven't really used face masks before, but I have no issues with this product. I like the bubbling, it tingles in a pleasant way. After rinsing, my skin feels so clean and looks much better. I'll be buying again.

reviews.review_header: It's weird, but in a good way I think..
reviews.review_text: You feel the tingling sensation when it starting to bubble up, and it's slimy to wash off.. so you might wanna do this before shower or in the bath.. didnt really feel much of a difference after one use... will update after few months. 😎

reviews.review_header: The effects are good! basically the same as any other clay mask
reviews.review_text: The effects are good! basically the same as any other clay mask. The skin gets very soft. But it was so hard to get it off! I thought it was because I put on too much product but it happened a second time, when I used much less! Also, I couldn`t achieve the quantity of bubbles some of the other users did... maybe I am using the wrong quantity.

I love this mask. The instructions are in korean but I apply it with the spatula it comes with inside onto my face. I wait until it becomes all fomay and cloud like on my skin so i can rinse it off with warm water. I'd say 20-30 minutes for it to foam. I highly recommend this product if you want smooth skin.

This product is SO worth the hype! This is exactly what it claims, a bubble clay mask. When opening the product there is a little spatula that comes with the mask. It was a little difficult for me to apply the product with the spatula, so in the future I will probably use a mask brush when applying. I made the mistake of putting on a thick layer, which I believe you only need a thin layer for this product to work or the removal will be a little time consuming. When it is first applied it appears to look like a clay mask. As you let it sit, it begins to foam and bubble up, which is super fun to watch. It does tickle a little bit while it is foaming, but nothing that would make me want to wash it off. I believe I left mine on for about five minutes. The directions say 3-5 but you could leave it on longer and it would be okay. This part threw me off a bit, but it wasn't a bad thing: I figured since it bubbled up and turned into foam, that it would remove like a foaming cleanser. I was wrong! You are supposed to manipulate the mask a bit after you let it foam up, and to my surprise it was still clay like under all of the bubbles. Once you manipulate and massage the mask the foam dissolves and you are back to your clay mask. This is where it gets to be a little annoying if you gobbed the mask on like I did. If you accidentally put on too much, I would suggest removing with a damp, hot towel. If you put on a thinner amount, you should be okay removing it with either a cotton pad or just water and your hands. My skin felt soooooo soft and looked brighter after using this mask. The next morning I noticed that a spot I have healing had decreased in redness by 50% - I'm not sure if it was this mask, or a combination of my skincare routine, but I am so satisfied. I would recommend this product to literally everyone!

reviews.review_header: Yeah it bubbles and that's about it
reviews.review_text: It's okay. Yes it bubbles but it didn't leave my skin feeling like it was clean or had done anything productive. It just felt like something was bubbling on my face, I'm gonna use it a few more times but I've been using it and having noticed any big difference. So if you want something that bubbles on your face but has no real effect, here ya go!
Noticed after second use that it expired July 2017. It was ordered for Xmas in November.

This is the most fun I've ever had with a beauty mask! I had seen many people use it on YouTube and couldn't believe how affordable it was. My skin felt nice and soft afterwards. I let it foam and then rubbed it in before rinsing off. I also feel like I'll get quite s few uses out of it as I didn't have to use a whole lot at one time, so that's great!

reviews.review_header: This is super fun to use
reviews.review_text: This is super fun to use. The bubbles really tickle, as others have stated. I'm not sure it actually cleared my pores to any large extent but it was so funny watching it foam up that I didn't care.

I really enjoyed this mask and it was fun to do, kind of funny to watch your face transform into a big puffy thing. I wouldn't recommend putting it near your eyes or nostrils as it will really expand and tickle the heck out of your nose or end up in your eyelashes! It smells great, the only thing is it is a bit hard to clean off but its not the end of the world. I've used it on a clean face and an oily face and my face always feels cleaner after using it and I haven't seen any adverse effects like breakouts or irritation.

reviews.review_header: I love this product and it removes all the dirt from ...
reviews.review_text: I love this product and it removes all the dirt from my face. It doesnt dry my skin out like some other products, but I can tell the difference after I use it.

reviews.review_header: It's literally the 8th wonder of the world
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS MASK SO MUCH! Okay so first off, the tingling is such a neat feeling like its so interesting. It might be a little more intense if you have super sensitive skin, but if not then you're good. Second, this stuff makes my skin incredible soft. Like soft as a baby's butt. Third, the whole experience was fun I don't like using products that make me feel like "Ok this is gonna suck and I know it". But not with this bad boy. This is such a great product and I would recommend to anyone who is looking for an interesting and great face mask! Plus it came 3 days earlier than it was supposed too!

reviews.review_header: A must have for clean pores
reviews.review_text: This was an experience! The scrub foams up and you can feel the carbonation on your face! My pores were so clean after. I’m so glad I bought this. I found a review on Pinterest about some great Amazon products and they weren’t lying!

reviews.review_header: So I wanted to try this because of all the ...
reviews.review_text: So I wanted to try this because of all the online articles about it and was pleasantly surprised that it works very well! I say put a small layer on your face so it doesn’t grow as fast but it makes your face feel soft after!

reviews.review_header: Not sure what it does? Also DO NOT BUY if you are at all ticklish
reviews.review_text: I really don't like this mask. I don't see the point? I think it's supposed to declog your pores, but there are better masks out there for that (such as Milky Piggy's Hell Pore Clean Up). My main problem though is that the bubbling action is SUPER ticklish on my skin. As soon as I put it on, I want to scratch my whole face. Keeping it on for 5 minutes to let it do whatever it's doing is TORTURE. Gah. Give this a pass.

Does such a great job at cleaning out and tightening pores. You really notice an effect after rubbing it in after the bubbles are fully formed. Fun to use as well! The bubbles do make your face itch while it's working, however, it's totally worth it.

This is a nice and fun mask but I don't think it really changed my skin all that much. It felt slightly softer but the texture of my skin almost felt more bumpy and my pore size was not at all reduced. It is really hard to wash off so I prefer to use it right before I shower because otherwise it gets rubbed into my hair and it's more trouble than it's worth at that point. Other people have mentioned it foams in the container but I used the spatula and put the lid on soon after opening. There's a good amount of product for the price so that's cool.

reviews.review_header: Fun and bubbly for the whole family!
reviews.review_text: This mask bubbles up when applied onto your face, and is very creamy and thick when you wash it off. I suggest using a face towel or sponge to wash it off, as just using your hands will take too much time. Other than that, it cleansed my pores well and left me with smooth skin. It's also really fun to use this mask with your friends and family. If you want to add some fun into your skincare routine, I say go for it! Delivery was also on time, as I received it about 2-3 weeks later.

We loved this at girls night. If you have acne prone skin or super sensitive skin, please test in a small area. I have very easy and non-sensitive skin, this mask left my skin amazingly soft and made my pores smaller.

reviews.review_header: Fun and Helpful but check if its good on your skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this clay mask because of a YouTube video I saw, and I'm honestly really pleased. I really only wanted it because the face mask bubbles, but I was surprised that instead it really does help clean my skin. A few things though that I noticed was I tried this mask on two of my family members and their skin was just too sensitive for the mask. Their faces felt itchy during it. I also found that the mass is drying which is fine if you have oily skin, and since I have a combination it works fine. JUST REMEMBER TO MOISTURIZE. Although I too felt a bit itchy with my first use, I really don't feel it much anymore. Overall this is a really fun but helpful mask, I would advise using it.

I love the foam and it smells pretty good too. I can feel it working its way through my acne and pores. Won't lie it kinda stings a little and it takes long to wash of afterwards. But Leaves my skin feeling great.

This does not clear pores as well as the ad mentions it's a black head remover. It actually caused more acne and made my face feel raw after words. I stuck with the product even after the breakouts because sometimes that can happen with a new product. I will say it removed quite a bit of dead skin. I really don't like that the name is in english and nothing else is including ingredients.
Leaves your skin feeling amazing. Very soft and the bubbles tickle quite a bit.
I use this on a weekly basis because it’s so much fun to feel it carbonate on my face! It leaves my face soft and smooth afterwards. Haven’t noticed a change in my acne, but I still use the product.
I bought this face mask just for fun (who doesn’t want a fluffy bubble face?) but wow I am impressed. This is one of my favorite face masks I have ever used. It made my skin look beautiful for days!

This is just okay. I don't see very much difference in my skin after use, and it is kind of hard to wash off of your face. The product will begin to bubble in the jar if you don't close it right away, so be careful with that! I like that it comes with a spatula for application.
Such a fun face mask! You also get multiple uses out of container jar, a little goes a long way! Left my skin feeling refreshed, very impressed!

This product is amazing! However, I try not to use it as frequent. I noticed it began to make my skin feel a little dried after consecutive use. So I spread it out to once a week along side with my daily regimen of anti wrinkle cream and rosehip oil. I especially love that it shrinks the pores around my nose and chin. I also use it around my neck. It may sound weird but I love how clean and soft my neck feels after a massive clean using this product!
I don't really write reviews but this was awesome! After using it twice a week for a couple of weeks now my pores are much smaller! I also have less accruing breakouts.

It's fizzy, bubbly, and very fun to apply! It takes a while to feel like I have fully removed it but no gunky feelings after my face is clean. I don't notice a giant change or any improvement in my skin but I do like pampering myself with a face mask now and then so this mask works for that.

This is fun to use. My daughter and I enjoyed the product, our skin felt very soft afterwards. It is pretty crazy and you end up looking like some kind of stone monster face by the time you are ready to wash it off. Hilarious! I am probably going to get some for my nieces to add to their Christmas gifts, they will get a kick out of it.

reviews.review_header: felt cool, but maybe not so clean.
reviews.review_text: I have seen a lot of hype about this product. I have larger pores, and wanted something to make my skin feel clean, and tighten up my pores. I liked the tingly feeling when I smeared this on my face. The way it bubbles makes me feel like it is lifting gunk out of my skin. The only thing I didn't like about the product was how hard it was to clean off. It has to be wiped and rubbed around, for a while. My skin felt good afterword, but not fully clean, like I was hoping for.

reviews.review_header: I have used a lot of face masks and this ...
reviews.review_text: I have used a lot of face masks and this one is in my top three. Skin feels noticeably softer after use and very clean. Comes with an applicator and jar seals tightly preventing leaks. Very impressed.

Love the way it makes me skin feel. The little scoop doesn't do much but I just use it to scoop the product onto my face and then smooth it all over my face with my fingers. The bubbling feeling is interesting and tickles ever so slightly. It's a little difficult to wash off but not bad, just keep rinsing until you don't feel the slipperiness anymore. I just put a light moisturizer on my face afterwards.

Oh. My gosh. This is awesome!!!!! I love it omg it's perfect! It's the real deal! It was a little expensive for its size (seeing that you can get a face mask that's twice it's size for like 2$) but it's so much fun to use and really makes my skin so clean! Totally awesome, recommended it to all of my friends!

reviews.review_header: Had to wash my face multiple times to get it to stop after just over a minute because it BURNED like hell. It took well over a week to ...
reviews.review_text: Burned my skin. I couldn’t even leave it on for a minute. It started tickling (thought it was normal due to the ‘bubble/fizzing’ description. Had to wash my face multiple times to get it to stop after just over a minute because it BURNED like hell. It took well over a week to heal the redness.

reviews.review_header: Great mask . Great gift . Makes you laugh every time you use it !
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this mask twice now ! The first time I bought it I had to see for myself what the hype was all about . I LOVED it ! It is like three masks in one . You apply it and it first feels like a hydrating gel mask . Almost like pudding . Then it starts to bubble and tickle your skin. It puffs up like a foam . Then you press it back into your skin and it will puff up again . Then massage it off of your skin and wash with a moist towel . It's actually meant to be a makeup remover as well. It suggests you apply the mask with makeup still on . The carbonation melts the makeup away ! Such a great product . And it's an excellent and inexpensive gift .

When I put this on it bubbled up like crazy and I looked like a swamp monster. When I rinsed it off my face looked so smooth and soft. I love it. My daughter tried it and liked it so much that I had to order a second jar.

i LOVE THIS SO MUCH. so i work early mornings and by the time i get home my face has just had it for the day. i have used my bubble clay mask a few times now ( i got it recently) and it literally lights my face up, and makes me feel really soft and glory after. first time you open it though it will look like some product(tiny bit off the top, nothing crazy)is missing, but i think that is a regularl occurence for Korean and other Asian beauty products.

reviews.review_header: Really liked the idea of this mask
reviews.review_text: Really liked the idea of this mask! When you first put it on, it can be kind of itchy and tickle a little bit. After a few minutes of wearing this, the itchy sensation goes away. The hardest part of this mask was taking it off. Once you add water and massage it into your face, it gets very thick.

This stuff works great! I love using this before a shower or after work. It really deep clean your face. One thing I would take into consideration is you don't want to take a long time to put this on, because it activates practically immediately. Also, it can tingle a bit if you apply too much, if you're not used to using face products. Just don't leave it on for more than 7 minutes. I did have to Google the instructions since it's all in Korean but it is very simple. I look forward to purchasing this again in the future!

I love this mask. I originally purchased it as I saw a few You Tube personalities reviewing it. It is has become something I use all the time. The container is quite big and holds a lot of product. It is satisfying to feel the bubbles on your face. It is a bit more of a process to rinse it off, but afterwards my skin feels so good.

Well this was a waste of money. It doesn't look like what's pictured in some of the other reviews, it was already bubbly looking and did not go on smoothly. It definitely didn't bubble up on the face like in the other reviews. Is everyone else's label in Korean?? Not a huge deal but was just kind of unexpected. Pretty disappointing overall.

reviews.review_header: Skin Looks and Feels the same 🤷🏻‍♀️
reviews.review_text: This was more fun than anything. Didn't really change the feeling of my skin at all. I made my boyfriend put it on his face and he didn't know it bubbled so he asked why the mask was making noises, so I got a lot of enjoyment out of that.
Got dry skin? Gone. Clogged pores? Disappeared. Oily skin? Taken care of. It does sting a little bit, but I have to say, this is by far the best face masque I've ever used.

reviews.review_header: but they also make you feel like something is crawling all over your face
reviews.review_text: The bubbles! The bubbles are hilarious looking when it's all activated, but they also make you feel like something is crawling all over your face. The urge to scratch everywhere was high. Didn't really care for it...

reviews.review_header: I love how fun this mask is but it can be ...
reviews.review_text: I love how fun this mask is but it can be super messy. It instantly bubbles up on your face once you apply the mask within 30 second. It doesn't allow you to finish the whole face before it bubbles up. It made my face really soft but I didn't feel like it remove anything in my pores or the black heads. I notice once you start to massage your face after it had bubbles for 5 minutes, it seem like there were a lot of products on my face for such a little amount that I put on. They should redirect to once you massage the face for two minutes, wash it off with a warm cloth instead of hand. It took me 5 plus min to wash the clay off. After I wash my face I notice it was soft but my pores look the same. Overall, it was a fun experience. I'll will definitely give it another try next week.
Super dried out my skin and caused breakouts and I didn't see any difference in my pores after.

Fun to use. My friend and I were trying it out and starts bursted out laughing because our faces looked so chubby! Foams up once it touches your face so you have to apply quickly. The smell is not strong, smells like clean soap. You can hear it bubble too. After I took it off, my pimples got noticeably smaller. The only downsides so that when you take the mask off, it is very hard to get off. You'll need to take it off with a towel that you're ok with getting dirty. The other downside is that it is extremely ticklish, especially around the nose area! Other than that, it's a great mask
Exactly how I expected it to be! It was bubbly and it grew! Made my skin feel nice afterward. It was a little tough to wash off, but not a big deal. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_header: Hysterical and at the same time fabulously useful! You come out after application looking like a ...
reviews.review_text: Hysterical and at the same time fabulously useful! You come out after application looking like a bit of a swollen bubbled monster and end up with fabulously soft clear skin. THIS is the stuff! Its really pretty cool.

reviews.review_header: Skip this one, unless you really want the bubbly face picture.
reviews.review_text: I like the way it bubbles up, but other than that, it's not that great of a face mask. It leaves my skin feeling kind of dry and irritated. It's also really hard to get off your skin and it tends to turn my sink gray. Won't purchase again.

reviews.review_header: Great mask, My skin feels amazing!
reviews.review_text: this mask is absolute magic! I was a bit skeptical about it but after using it I couldnt stop touching my face, my skin was so soft, even my bf loves it! The instructions were not in english so I has to look up tutorials and instructions, pretty easy steps. It tends to dry out the skin so it's better to moisturize after.

reviews.review_header: I've been wanting to try this product forever! It ...
reviews.review_text: I've been wanting to try this product forever! It left my skin smooth and firm but did irritate it in certain spots which the irritation went away over night. I have sensitive skin so it didn't surprise me when it happened. Despite the mild irritation I will definitely use it again.

reviews.review_header: AMAZING! This product felt awesome on my face
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! This product felt awesome on my face! I did it love on my Facebook.com/tiffandcari page. It worked as intended and my face felt amazing after. I will say that you have to spend some time washing it off after. Also, DO NOT get it near your eyes because it will bubble and possibly get into them!

This was an interesting experience using this mask. However, I am rating it 3 stars instead of 5 because of the difficulty removing the mask. It also caused my nieces skin to turn a bit red, and my cousin complained that it felt itchy. So this may not be the best for sensitive skin. I'd suggest patch testing it to see if it works for you.

Fun in a jar. Had a bad day? Put this on and laugh for a bit. As to how it works? Pretty much like any other mask that I've tried. I like that it comes with a small spatula so that you are not contaminating the rest of the mask every time you use it. It smells kinda meh, but who cares?

I love this mask! The consistency of the clay mask was gooey, but felt great on my skin, next thing I know, it starts to fizz on my face, it felt really good like my skin was getting clean in a way that scrubs wish they could do! My face is softer to the touch and I can't wait to use it again. The seal was a bit difficult to open, but other than that, a real easy to use product.

reviews.review_header: Skip facials - this is all you'll need !
reviews.review_text: I am seriously obsessed with this stuff. It's the ONLY mask I've ever done where I actually notice a HUGE difference even a day later. After this mask, my skin literally looks like I just got a facial and my make up always goes on so smoothly the next day. I've started to use this once/twice a week instead of getting facials as this stuff really gets out everything/brings it all to the surface. I've started to get it for my friends too.

reviews.review_header: This is a fun and great product
reviews.review_text: This is a fun and great product. Was part of a package of "beauty" items that I sent my sister for Christmas... sadly they got stolen off the front porch and I had to repurchase them to get her gift to her. Wish we could get shipping insurance!lol and more cops nabbing package thieves

I had a mask party with my friends! We saw this on youtube and thought it was a fun mask to try. Slap this baby on, wait 10 minutes, and take selfies. It starts to bubble up and you'll look like the Michelin Man. It doesn't irritate the skin but you may feel a tingle. I feel like its drawing out the impurities to the surface. Your skin will feel amazing afterwards! The only downside is that it is a bit hard to wash off. You may need a wet towel to wipe it off then rinse.

I absolutely love this face mask. I had to look up instructions since it's not in English, but other than that it's amazing. I always get compliments on how good my skin looks from using it, and it feels great too.
Love how it comes with an applicator. Makes my skin feel baby soft! Kind of itches my face when it foams but you don't have to keep it on for my than 5 minutes so it's okay.

reviews.review_header: This mask is so fun! I got this as a fun thing to ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is so fun! I got this as a fun thing to do with my boyfriend. His face was so funny when this started bubbling! It also makes your face so smooth and feels so clean. Make sure you get an even coat of this the first time. If you go back in to try to add more it gets weird feeling. Storing this is also kinda tricky. I throw all of my beauty products in a bag, with this jar that can get king of messy so i recommend keeping it sitting on a counter or medicine cabinet.

reviews.review_header: It was a lot of fun. It starts to tickle about a minute after ...
reviews.review_text: Just used this for the first time. It was a lot of fun. It starts to tickle about a minute after you apply. I let it sit for 5, then flushed it off with lukewarm water. My skin feels so soft! It was a little sensitive as I washed off the mask, but that went away quickly. The packaging is adorable and has a place for the little spatula it comes with for application. I feel like this product will last for a long time as I didn't have to use much at all.

reviews.review_header: but I absolutely enjoy this one & how it makes my face feel
reviews.review_text: I've never used a Bubble Mask before this one, but I absolutely enjoy this one & how it makes my face feel. It's easy to use, and I even use the little spatula it came with on other masks that I have to help apply them!

This mask gets a 10/10 on the fun factor. It's very entertaining to watch it foam up. I don't know that it did much for my actually skin quality. I broke out really bad with acne the day after I used it both times so I personally won't continue to use, but I often break out with skin care products.

reviews.review_header: It's fun who knows if it works
reviews.review_text: Trying on a new face mask I saw on @amazon . It reminds me of those rock trolls from frozen. I would recommend washing this while in the shower

reviews.review_header: Its ok. Hard to rinse out
reviews.review_text: I can't really say long term, since I have only used it once. It tickled a TON when it was starting to bubble, and it stung just a little bit, but I have very sensitive skin. It's super hard to rinse off too.

reviews.review_header: Got for fun but it actually works!
reviews.review_text: This mask is so fun. It absolutely bubbles up on your face like all the pics and videos show. Not only that, but your done in 5 min as opposed to 10-30min, which sometimes I just am too busy for. Not only that, but my face was noticably cleaner, clearer, and smoother after just one mask. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_header: Product works well to exfoliate and clear out my blackheads ...
reviews.review_text: Product works well to exfoliate and clear out my blackheads. But the hardest part is washing this stuff off. After the foam for five mins, rub in some water to exfoliate more, then use 3 gallons of water to get it off your face. I've learned to use the face mask just before it's time to shower so I can just wash in there instead of splashing all over my sink. haha
bought for my sister, she uses it once a week and really likes it. it bubbles up fast, so move quick, but it rinses off squeaky clean and smooth and it has a nice scent.

I love this mask. As soon as it (very quickly) arrived, I took off my makeup and slathered this mask on. It's not as overly drying as I feel a lot of drugstore masks can be. It's carbonated, so the bubbles fizz up and it's a bit tickley and a bit stingy, as most masks are! Also my cat (pictured) wouldn't stop trying to bat at the bubbles! Upon rinsing my face, my skin felt really smooth and nice. I used a moisturizer afterward, just because this is clay so it might dry you face a bit! Overall this thing is frickin fun and I love it!

This makes my day e feel so soft and clean but the only thing I don't like is its so so so hard to get off. It's a mess lol. It took me 10min just to get it off so I suggest that if u use it, make sure u use it before you get in the shower. Other that that, it's great.

So to be honest I can't say for sure that this does what it does (tightens pores and smoothes/soothes complexion) better than any other good clay mask. But I CAN tell you that it does those things very well, and it is SO FUN to use. It foams up like scrubbing bubbles and provides a truly joyful, hilarious experience. Everyone needs this.

reviews.review_header: Just what I was looking for!
reviews.review_text: I was soooo excited for it to come. When it finally came I couldn't wait till bed time to try it out, so applied it right away. I guess I touched a little bit issue cuz it started bubbling in the container. But it seems fine, just wipe the spatula after each apply. It smells really good too. I didn't think it have any smell to it but was surprised to a nice smell to it. I loved it. My face felt really nice and clean after. Don't forget to moisturize your face after! Great product.

reviews.review_header: the first time I applied the mask I went running through the house like a maniac
reviews.review_text: Looks weird, feels weird, but so worth it! Immediately after application, the bubbles start to form and, honestly, the first time I applied the mask I went running through the house like a maniac, fanning my face the whole time. Super pretty. Afterward, however, my face felt fantastic! My skin felt clean and smooth, and my complexion appeared more even. If you get this, take lots of photos of yourself as a bridge troll to send to your friends and family!

Great product!! I love how my skin felt after I used it. I have a combination of dry to oily skin and it worked great for me. I love how well packaged it came and how the seller even included samples. The shipping came much more faster then expected. Will definitely re purchase in the future.. Also came with the original serial code, to verify that it is an original product.

reviews.review_header: Packaging is terrible and would not open
reviews.review_text: I gave it a 3 because I could not get into the jar. I had to bust the bottom out and inside there is another container an inch up from the bottom. I then had to turn over and pry at the top after I took lid off. I finally kept hitting it a d it finally released!! Very poor pkging. What a hassle.

I love this mask! I have dry combination skin and this does a great job of cleaning out and shrinking my pores without making my face feel dry or tight. I usually do this mask once a week before bed and wash it off, and in the morning, my skin looks like a baby's! It's awesome.

This stuff really works! I have big pores on my nose and forehead and this mask has helped in cleaning them out and making them smaller in the process. The mask is fun to use and tickles like crazy. The smell is light and the container comes with a paddle to dip out the mask which is really helpful. Leave this stuff on for 5 min, rub in and wash off, your face will feel amazing.
Love this stuff! My face feels so refreshed and clean after I use this. I use it about 1-2 times a week for a deep clean. Only complaint is that I wish they sold a bigger size.

I love this!! so much fun to use. I don't know if it makes a big difference with blackheads but my face does feel cleaner after I use it. It is best to try before a shower so you can wash all of it off, otherwise it takes a very long time to was away.

reviews.review_header: I like this mask a lot
reviews.review_text: I like this mask a lot. My face feels extremely clean after using but it is very messy! I also cleanse my face before using to make sure my make up is removed so the mask can do what it's supposed to do!

Wow! I just did this mask for the first time and I'm super impressed. It feels really weird while it's on but it definitely cleans your skin. My face feels so light and clean. Next time I'll definitely rinse it off in the shower, though. It's a little hard to rinse off.

If you want to be a cloud, this is the way to go. Get out the amount you need and quickly reseal the jar or it will all start growing, as it reacts to air. I can't really speak to the cleansing aspect of this mask, but it's good for giggles.

I was so excited for this which makes it even more disappointing. Yes, it bubbles like people havw shown and such. However, it smells and feels so chemical-y and it burns my skin. I've used so many different face masks and I don't really have sensitive skin. But this is just horrible :/ I'm sad to have to say this.

About me: Oily/Combo skin that's dehydrated and acne-prone About the product: I love this mask! This was my very first Korean skin care product. Immediately after using it, I noticed how soft my skin felt! My skin also looked less red and irritated. I just received my second jar in the mail a few days ago - I'll use this mask as long as Elizavecca makes it! :)

reviews.review_header: Super fun mask, the bubbles are real
reviews.review_text: I just bought this mask because a lot of my favorite youtubers featured and recommended it for oily skin especially. It was definitely worth the buy because my skin feels super clean and soft afterward. It removed a lot of the excess sebum and impurities without stripping all the skin's natural oils. Pros: -Fun mask due to the bubbles -Leaves skin clean and soft, good for oily/combo skin -Short time compared to other masks (minimum is 5, but you can go up to 10 if you want) Cons: -Tingling or burning may occur depending on your skin sensitivity -Bubbles might be a bit uncomfortable for some people -Might be difficult to remove, see tip below Helpful tip: Put this mask on before you go take a shower. Once you go take a shower, you can wash it off in there with less hassle than struggling to take it off at the bathroom sink. I haven't seen any major differences in skin such as blackheads going bye bye yet, but like any mask that'll take time to see. Would definitely update, but I still would just recommend for how fun and effective it has been for my oily skin in terms of softness and oil removal at the moment. Also, if you're worried about getting a fake (since a lot of foreign products can be.counterfeit), you can check by first looking if the box has a Elizavecca Original sticker, scratch the foil for the QR #, and verifying on the Elizavecca website through the QR code link. And if ingredients is a concern, Memebox is the best source since it lists the ingredients in English. Update: After using this mask consistently and now on my second tub, I can say that it definitely helped in clearing my oily/now a bit more combo skin. My skin is still soft and clean after each use, and in fact my pores reduced in size! Slowly but surely. My blackheads are mostly gone too (90% with just a little on my nose). I still recommend this product after almost a year of use. Finally to note, it seems that Elizavecca updated their box packaging a bit as my second tub now has instructions and ingredients in English.

It foams up and makes your face feel like a million bucks. It makes your skin super soft and you can feel a difference. While using it, don't fret about it feeling all itchy. It's just a bunch of bubbles foaming on your face. It feels insanely itchy while using it, but it's such a unique experience—so fun and quick and the results are amazing!

reviews.review_header: I love this mask use once a week
reviews.review_text: I love this mask use once a week. It does make your face itchy due to the bubbles but no t in a bad way. Rinse off with a hot wet towel. If not you will be rinsing for a very long time.

reviews.review_header: Funnest face mask I ever tried
reviews.review_text: This really is just like they say on the internet-a super fun face mask. I love the gentle tingling sensation as it bubbles and does its thing. I have seen people break the bubbles and let it bubble again. I have tried that and it was ok-more fun to watch I guess.

This is ridiculous amounts of fun, and it really works!! Make sure to spread an even, moderate layer on quickly, because it starts to bubble immediately. After 4 or 5 minutes (and awesome selfie opprotunities) pat down the bubbles and rub mask into face again for a deeper more thorough clean. It turns into a soap when you rinse it off. Rinse completely, pat dry, and follow with your favorite moisturizer. Don't skimp, your skin will inhale it. Results in incredibly soft, even, smooth skin.

This is the kind of mask that you want to do with other people. It does burn if you get it in your eyes (which is obviously expected...but I'm clumsy) so do be careful. My skin feels amazing afterwards, and it's just so fun to use! I highly recommend this mask if you want to have a fun spa night, and I will be using this with my mom whenever she visits. It's just really fun and effective!

I was super excited to receive this item!!!! But then I opened it and it was already oxygenized. No fizzing occurred. Disappointed and hope the seller contacts me. Texture was closer to a messed up jello, not able to use it. dissapointment, please contact me

I really enjoy this mask. It definitely does SOMETHING to my face. The tingly-ticklish sensation is weird but as soon as you wipe the mask off, your face will feel great. Although, when I was applying it, I wasn't expecting the foam to expand SO much - it almost got in my eyes and could feel it burn a little. Definitely avoid your eye area when applying because the foam expands A LOT.

such an amazing product! I've never had such a fun clay mask in my life. It starts to bubble up after 1 minute on the face and after 15 minutes I look like a bubble monster. It leaves my skin extremely clean, my pores look clear and it leaves my face smooth. I'd buy again

reviews.review_header: WATCH HOW YOU APPLY BECAUSE WHEN IT FOAMS IT ITCHES AND IRRITATES LIKE HELL. YOU JUST WANT TO SCRATCH YOUR FACE ...
reviews.review_text: THIS MASK LEFT MY FACE FEELING SO FREAKING SOFT AND CLEANSED. THIS TOOK SOME OF MY BLACKHEADS AWAY. WATCH HOW YOU APPLY BECAUSE WHEN IT FOAMS IT ITCHES AND IRRITATES LIKE HELL. YOU JUST WANT TO SCRATCH YOUR FACE FROM THE FOAMING. THE INGREDIENTS ARE NOT IN ENGLISH BUT IT IS A FUN MASK. APPLY FAST CAUSE IT DOES FOAM UP FAST.

reviews.review_header: It is something fun for a girls night in or something
reviews.review_text: Giving it 2 stars only for the experience. It is something fun for a girls night in or something. It was very messy to wash off, left my skin baby soft for a good 20 minutes before it started to feel really dry and had to apply extra moisturizer for the next few days. But again, it was fun and would only purchase again for the novelty of it.
Bubbles in seconds you can feel it work,I love it

reviews.review_header: I love it and can't get enough of it
reviews.review_text: This product leaves your skin soft and smooth. I love it and can't get enough of it. I can definitely see my pores getting clean because the little blackhead on my nose I get time to time disappeared after few use of this product. Only thing is, its really itchy during the 5 minute duration you have to leave it on your face. Other than that, this product is awesome!

reviews.review_header: Fun product that leaves skin very soft.
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim after talking with a beautiful Korean heritage co-worker. I'm not much for beauty products & all that. But this is fun. It is hilarious, fun to use & left my skin very soft. Not sure it's doing a lot else, but totally left my skin feeling lovely for a few days. Plus it's fun, so I'll make time to use it.

Love the mask and concept just wish it washed off more easily when taking off. Also it burns when you get into your eyes so keep in mind while applying this mask to keep far from eyes because the mask expands when on.

Pretty basic, clay mask, bubbles up on contact with skin. It smells very strongly like flowery lotion until washed off. My skin got a little sore while using it, but it made it extremely soft and took away the oils as I thought it would. The bubbling is lots of fun, it stands out pretty far when fully bubbled up, and tickles the nose like crazy. Very cool product for a little fun with folks for an at home spa thing though.

reviews.review_header: This stuff was pretty much what I was expecting
reviews.review_text: This stuff was pretty much what I was expecting! I used it as soon as I took it out of the package. And it was very exciting and fun to use. I love how soft and fresh my face felt afterwards, especially my nose! But it does feel like my face is kind of dry now (more than usual) not sure if it's the product or my sensitive skin! I could definitely see myself buying this again and recommending it to others! I do wish the jar was a little bigger, but I learned immediately after applying that a little goes a long way!! Haha.

reviews.review_header: I have NEVER been so pleased with a product as I am with this one
reviews.review_text: I have NEVER been so pleased with a product as I am with this one. If I could give it 10 stars, I would. I have had large dark pores on my nose throughout my entire life. This is the first time I have been able to COMPLETELY clear my pores with one product. It is certainly thick, and difficult to clean off your face... And holy cow does it tickle... But it WORKS. Buy it, try it. You won't be disappointed.

I love this stuff. I have very sensitive skin but I did not have any bad reactions to this stuff. It did seems to make my skin slightly dry around my chin but I put some moisturizer on and it was fine. It really did make my skin look and feel better after one application. It was fun watching it bubble up. I can see doing this once every 2 weeks.

reviews.review_header: Super fun, easier to apply than I thought
reviews.review_text: Super fun, easier to apply than I thought, felt really refreshing. My skin felt noticeably firm and tight the rest of the day. It feels like a science experiment. Would buy again.

reviews.review_header: Smells good! Left face feeling soft and clean
reviews.review_text: Smells good ! Left face feeling soft and clean !! Love it and Will purchase this product again !!

Upon purchasing this mask I've used it at least 6 times. The novelty of the mask hasn't died down, I love using this mask. Because this is a clay mask it also removes impurities and makes your face really soft. The mask isn't pricey at all, you get a lot of uses out of it so I recommend this mask to anyone looking for a good mask for a good price

This mask is such a fun experience and it really feels like it’s getting everything clean and out of your pores. It’s the easiest of all masks to put on, and even that is fun! Will definitely continue buying the product. I enjoy it so much! And the bubbles tickle near the end haha

This mask is so fun! It’s wonderful, it actually works, and the price point is perfect. I shared it with a bunch of girlfriends and it was a blast. We all thought we looked ridiculous but our faces felt fantastic. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_header: It did bubble though and made for a great laugh. I will have to use it more ...
reviews.review_text: I used it once so I am not sue if it actually did anything for my skin. It did bubble though and made for a great laugh. I will have to use it more to see if it actually helps my skin.

only giving this a 3 star because I can hardly use it. The feeling of the bubbles fizzing on your face is so darn itchy I cannot stand it. Unfortunately I can't really use this product myself to see what the results would be.

reviews.review_header: Fun to use/ feels good whole bubbling however I didn't ...
reviews.review_text: Fun to use/ feels good whole bubbling however I didn't notice any actual results on my skin plus it's a bit hard to wash off. It's perfect for days where your skin doesn't need much but you still want to pamper yourself.
Whoa! Love how smooth my face feels after using this product. The instructions are not in English, but I put it on my face, let it sit for 10-15 minutes, and wash it off. It really does bubble!

reviews.review_header: I love it! the only problem I and many others ...
reviews.review_text: I love it! the only problem I and many others have is the directions aren't in English so I treat it just like it's any other face mask I use. Though the product does remove makeup and other toxins, I still rid my face of makeup and oil from the day with warm water and face soap. I found opening your pores with warm water works most effectively for the end result. When applying the mask, apply the product further away from eyes, nose, and mouth because the mask expands more than expected. Leaving the product on for 10-15 minutes once a week leaves my skin feeling fresh and smooth. It's also hilarious to see and feel the mask fizz before your eyes!

I really like this product. I have used it a few times and it really does leave my skin amazingly smooth and soft, plus it's a lot of fun to use. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it is so incredibly messy. Definitely best to use this product before a shower.

This product is so fun. I thought it was just for kicks but it actually leaves my face feeling softer and clean afterwards. It is really hard not to itch or touch your face when you it bubbling. Would definitely buy again.

My daughter and I got this today and tried it. Very tingly and fun to use, and the reviews I read are very true...our skin is so soft after using. Did not come with an applicator, we used our fingers, and the best advice I can say is to apply it quickly as after a few seconds it will start to foam. Will be buying this again!

reviews.review_header: Made her skin worse than ever
reviews.review_text: Do not buy this product. Bought this for my wife and her face broke out after using it. Made her skin worse than ever. If you want to risk your face, this is the product for you.

Super strange, makes me a bit itchy to use, but my face feels good after I rinse. The carbonation tickles a lot, and I recommend not layering too much on, or it'll bubble into your eyes, nose, and mouth. But definitely a cool product.

Pros: it’s fun to watch it bubble and it does give you a nice glow after Cons: it’s super messy to take off and maybe this was my fault but I put on a thick layer and it took forever to get it off my face. It then went into my eye which made it very red and angry. Overall: It was fun to try but there are many other easier options for glowing skin.

The mask tickles and stings but that's how you know it's working! Try not to cover your nose area because it expands quite a bit and gets in the way of breathing. I've seen visible results of my pores clearing on just the first use! But everyone's skin is different so what works for me might not work for you. It dries out my cousin's sensitive skin.

reviews.review_header: ... as impressed as thought we’d be but it’s a fun product for my teenagers
reviews.review_text: Not as impressed as thought we’d be but it’s a fun product for my teenagers. Doesn’t bubble the way it shows or maybe we aren’t using enough? Is a good mask though.

reviews.review_header: This mask is great! It's fun to use and makes my skin ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is great! It's fun to use and makes my skin feel soft and moisturized. I usually keep the mask on for ~20 minutes or so (way longer than the recommended time) but I haven't had any problems at all with it so far. I've used this 5 or so times and I'm only about 3/4 of the way through with it. It has a scent; it's not bad, but I'm not sure what to compare it to. Bottom line: would recommend.

I’m kind of obsessed with Korean skincare, and this is honestly just a party trick. It’s fun the first time and would be for like a girls night or in you’re younger a sleepover, but I really don’t think it helps at all.
Bought for my 13 year old daughter. She loves it. Cleared up her face. Left face smooth and silky. We live in Ak and product arrived in 12 days. 3 weeks ahead of delivery date.

reviews.review_header: ... so excited to find this on amazon for a great price. The website for the company is more ...
reviews.review_text: Saw a video for this on facebook and was so excited to find this on amazon for a great price. The website for the company is more expensive. It's easier to use your fingers than the little piece of plastic to spread it out on your face. I love how it bubbles up and how afterwards my face is so smoothe. The directions though is in another language but I remembered the info from the video.

reviews.review_header: It was a fun product to use
reviews.review_text: It was a fun product to use. The directions are all in Korean so I wasn't really sure how long to leave it on but there are alot of beauty bloggers who have tried and said 10 min. I kept it on for 10 minutes and the bubbles were taking over my face, in a good way. Make sure you don't put it too close to the nostrils because it will definitely grow. My face felt smoother after and pores looked smaller.

reviews.review_header: It burns more than some other face masks do. ...
reviews.review_text: It burns more than some other face masks do. I do have sensitive skin but usually clay masks don't give me any issues. I'll probably continue to use this just to see if it clears up my complexion.

reviews.review_header: but great makes my face feel super soft and my skin ...
reviews.review_text: This stuff is weird, but great makes my face feel super soft and my skin looks nice. The inscriptions were in Korean so I had to look it up online, but leave on for five minutes then smush all the bubbles down and rub it in some more then rise it off. Your supposed to use a chestnut size scoop of the cream.

reviews.review_header: Best thing I’ve ever bought on amazon
reviews.review_text: Best thing I’ve ever bought on amazon. Couldn’t stop laughing. The girls and I died of heart attacks. So much fun. The boyfriends got a major kick out of it.

reviews.review_header: Didn't feel like it did anything for my skin either
reviews.review_text: The tingling from the bubbles popping was just itchy! I kept it on for a few minutes before I had to get it off my face. I was afraid it was an allergic reaction for a bit but it was just the bubbles. Didn't feel like it did anything for my skin either.
Great product! It was also so fun to use. My teenage sons saw me using it and she to use it with me so we have facial nights every bite and then when we it put on and hang out together. Fun times

reviews.review_header: It foams up pretty quick so you have to apply it fast
reviews.review_text: It foams up pretty quick so you have to apply it fast. It's also kind of hard to wash off. Used it a couple times and my skin feels normal after, not super dry or moisturized. It's fun to use with friends and take pictures of though lol

Pleasant (not strong at all) smell, fun to use, nice and clean after. I will post photos when I have the chance! Got rid of husband's blackheads, too. Can use it every day before your normal face care routine without upsetting your skin.

Awesome product! When you put it on your face its very very cooling and you can literally feel the mask bubbling up on your face. It left my skin really smooth and soft. It did wonders for my blackheads! It didn't completely remove all of them but there was a noticeable difference in the amount. The packaging is cute and has an airtight seal to ensure the mask does not carbonate. I'm giving it four stars since it took was late arriving to my house even though it only shipped from Vegas and I got priority shipping

reviews.review_header: in the best way. I was worried it may burn or ...
reviews.review_text: This was the weirdest experience I've had with a facial mask, in the best way. I was worried it may burn or feel uncomfortable on, but it was great. It definitely tickled my nose but it was worth it, my skin was so bright and soft after and it cleaned out most of my problem areas, I was hoping it would reduce the pores on my nose a little more but in a few days I'm going to give it another go and hopefully it'll clear the rest up! I highly recommend this product.

Pretty cool. Only use it twice a week, though, as it tends to dry your skin out quickly. VERY mess, which is why I’m only giving it three stars. No matter how careful you try to be with opening and closing the product, air makes it bubble and carbonate, even when closed. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_header: I hated this! It tickles my face in a horrible ...
reviews.review_text: I hated this! It tickles my face in a horrible way, and every time I use it, I end up breaking out. I gave it two stars because the first time was funny, at least, but I will never use it again.
My skin looks so clean and luminous after using this product! Don't leave it on for more than 10 mins, though. It's hard to take off if it hardens. :)

reviews.review_header: Love it! It's a weird sensation
reviews.review_text: Love it! It's a weird sensation, the foaming and bubbling, but it's very pleasant. Honestly I can't tell you that I see any major skin improvement or that it's really done much for my complexion but it's very refreshing feeling, so it's worth it for that alone.

reviews.review_header: Fun and unique product but doesn't work so well with my skin.
reviews.review_text: I don't particularly have sensitive skin, but this tends to make my face a bit blotchy the next day after use. However, while it'/ on my face it has a great feeling and it's fun to share it with my mom and sisters to enjoy the tingly/bubbly effect together. But because of the effects it has on my skin, I make sure to minimize it's use to maybe once a month or once every two months. I'm sure that it works fantastic on other people's skin, based on the reviews I've seen but beware that you may have some odd after-effects from it depending on your skin type. It's still worth the buy.
This made me breakout, and I'm not prone to acne or breakouts. Tried it twice. It is fun. But won't use or buy it again.

It’s fine. Definitely not worth the rave reviews. It’s a fun novelty. The mask is definitely hard to remove. The carbon becomes ashy and as you take it off it sort of foams so you have to rinse it a ton to get it all off. I prefer just a straight up clay mask

Love this face mask! Be sure to use the applicator that comes with it because if you use your fingers to scoop the mask out of the jar it will start to bubble and react with the oils from your skin. I tried it with my mom and it was super fun. My skin felt very smooth and hydrated after cleaning off the mask. But, beware! The longer you keep it on your face the more bubbly it gets!

reviews.review_header: If it wasn’t for my rosacea...
reviews.review_text: I would’ve given this 5 stars had it not made my rosacea flare up. It felt really funny on and it bubbles up just as described. My skin was as smooth as a baby’s bottom until the next day when my rosacea became very very angry. Good product though.

reviews.review_header: Its very fun to use and wear
reviews.review_text: Its very fun to use and wear, beware tho the bubbles are itchy! Ingredients and instructions are in Korean but it's a face mask so pretty self explanatory . My favorite mask ever. Makes my face feel so smooth. Have bought it multiple times

reviews.review_header: I don't mind the smell of this mask like I read in other reviews
reviews.review_text: This is my first day using this product so it will be a first impression. I don't mind the smell of this mask like I read in other reviews. It's subtle, goes away and kind of just smells earthy to me. I love how little of this product I need to use to cover my whole face. Just the amount that was on the cover I lifted off of the jar was more than enough, meaning this will last me a while. It bubbles pretty quickly, and continues to bubble and expand throughout the 5 minutes and kind of tickles! After the 5 minutes I wet my hands and massaged it into my face again for a couple minutes and left it on for another 2 minutes before washing it off. It was a bit hard to wash it off, however, and took a bit of time to get it all off my face. Afterwards, my skin feels really soft and nice. Second day update: This morning when I woke up before work, my face was more moisturized and plump feeling, and this was the only thing I did differently. Recently, I've been breaking out a bit, and I never usually suffer from pimples or acne. Today the new pimples I've recently been struggling to get rid of are significantly smaller in size and look like they're on their way off my face. I don't know if the mask is what helped with this, but it did happen the day after using the mask. Also just from how soft and nice my skin feels after this mask, I'm really happy with this product.

reviews.review_header: So much fun feeling the bubbles all over my face
reviews.review_text: So much fun feeling the bubbles all over my face. I try and use it once a week or so because it helps reduce the oiliness on my face. I also will rub the mask in after the 15 mins of bubbling and it re bubbles if I am taking a bath and a want longer time. I am planning on gettign it for most of my girlfriends as gifts.

reviews.review_header: So far so good! It definitely tingles and the mask definitely starts ...
reviews.review_text: So far so good! It definitely tingles and the mask definitely starts to bubble up super fast! I saw this everywhere on youtube so I finally decided to try it out! It left my skin so smooth the first time. Not so much around my nose with my black and white heads I have going on there. But I will use this product at least once a week and see the results then. But I like it! Oh and definitely clean the little scoop after each scoop inside the product! It will start bubbling up in there as well! :)

Honestly? This does absolutely nothing for your skin. I used most of the container and have seen no difference at all. Granted its super fun to see your face look like the rock trolls from frozen. Overall I wouldn’t recommend it if you’d actually looking for improvements in your skin.

I love this mask!! I couldn't wait to put it on when it was delivered. It bubbles as soon as you apply it and it does tickle. It did not itch, but it was very messy when I tried to take it off. I would recommend either taking it off in the shower or having a towel you don't mind getting dirty. It did make my skin very soft and clean feeling. The only downside is that it did take about 3 weeks to be delivered with standard shipping, but that's because it is from South Korea. It came well packaged, in a box, and the container was sealed.

reviews.review_header: This is a fun mask to try
reviews.review_text: This is a fun mask to try. It bubbles up on your face, which did cause some itching feeling. Overall though, I'm not convinced there is anything magical to it.

I bought this mask after my sister had tried it, and I am so thankful I did. This dramatically shrinks my pores and is super fun when it bubbles on your face. It has become part of my morning routine. It leaves my skin so soft and perfect for putting on make up. I am so glad I found this awesome mask!

As much as I hate to say it.... This mask sort of SUCKED for people with sensitive skin! The first few minutes of bubbling felt good and was fun, but after I had removed the mask the chaos began. this masks sucks ALL the moisture out of your face. My face turned red and flaky for a few days after using this mask. Beware if you have sensitive skin!!
My face felt so soft afterwards! Recommend!

Love it! New beauty routine staple! My face feels so nice and looks clearer and brighter after 2 weeks. Its fun and freeing and just so cool. My skin is pretty stubborn and not sensitive at all so I use it every morning but I advise people to start slowly.

This was fun/weird. Not necessarily a life-changing difference in my skin, but I wasn’t expecting it to be. Took off a star because it was surprisingly difficult to wash off. You really only need a very thin layer.

How does grey sludge in a jar become foamy fabulousness that leaves your face fantastic? I do not know, but I will buy it again! Fun, and it works. Comes with a spatula and instructions in English on the box.

My face felt great afterwards, it's fun to do which was half the reason I purchased it! Was itchy while it bubbled like it was tickling my face, but so worth it! Lots of fun and my face felt and looked cleaner and softer.

reviews.review_header: fun to try with your partner or a friend
reviews.review_text: My pores were dramatically smaller. It’s a little itchy when it’s on from the carbonated sensation. Makes you giggle, fun to try with your partner or a friend. Quality product and great stocking stuffer. It helped my redness and breakouts too.

reviews.review_header: Bubbling is fun and all but it honestly tingles my face and ...
reviews.review_text: Bubbling is fun and all but it honestly tingles my face and it makes me want to just itch my face >_<... Also I dont know if I notice anything really noticeable in the status of my face after using the product... It takes a while for me to wash off all the product too and it makes a mess like any clay mask would.. So I usually use it right before I jump into shower to wash it off.

Fun! This is such a fun product! :D :D I really enjoyed the bubbles and how it seems to grow haha. My friend did have a slight reaction and got itchy but I've had no problems with it so I would suggest testing it on a small part of your face first. Also - a little goes a long way! :D

This is a fun face mask, and it works! You need to apply it fairly quickly, since it starts activating almost right away. It feels unlike any other masks I've tried, freaked me out the first time because I couldn't tell if it was my skin reacting negatively to the product, or just the feel of the bubbles. It worked great however, my skin felt soft and smooth. Can't go wrong with the price, would make a good gift.

reviews.review_header: I love this product and would definitely buy it again
reviews.review_text: Cleared up my skin and cleaned out my pores. I love this product and would definitely buy it again. Obviously I wouldn't use this daily but whenever I start to break out or need a quick refresher I use this. You have to be careful not to leave the lid off too long or it will start to bubble in the container but otherwise an amazing product.

reviews.review_header: Love love love this face mask
reviews.review_text: Love love love this face mask! After seeing all of the reviews on youtube, I decided to give it a try. Your face seriously feels flawless afterwards. I would recommend refrigerating after use and to not leave the cap open! Hurry and take the amount of product you need and quickly seal the cap back so it does not get oxidized.

reviews.review_header: This mask is so amazing. At first it's a bit hard not to ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is so amazing. At first it's a bit hard not to laugh as you watch this stuff bubble on your face and you look like an old grey stay puff marshmallow man, but when you follow the steps and massage and clean your face you are left with such supple skin. It does so well removing dirt and impurities from your face and the result is baby soft luxurious feeling skin.

reviews.review_header: However I loved it! This mask is both fun and it ...
reviews.review_text: I used the whole mask kit before writing a review. However I loved it! This mask is both fun and it does make my skin smoothe. One thing that I didn't like as much is it is really hard to wash off. Showers are better to wash this mask off with. However kudos to the company that made this, it is inventive, delightful, and unique!

reviews.review_header: moisturizing, but not as deep cleaning
reviews.review_text: this mask feels great! the bubbling doesn't sting and leaves my skin smooth and soft. it is not as strong as other masks i have tried, so do not get this expecting all of your black heads to be removed. it is difficult to wash off. i recommend using this right before you jump into the shower. although it is not the best, it is worth a try if you're looking for a mask that does not dry out your skin.

I don’t use this product to necessarily “help” my skin, or reduce blemishes or acne, but it definitely helps to keep everything under control when I’m having an extra oily day or feel like I’m on the verge of a breakout. I honestly couldn’t complain about it. It’s a face mask, nothing to the extremes wanted from this. It does its job amazingly.

This was the weirdest mask experience of my life. The bubbles were about an inch tall by the time I got to the final step. No gonna lie, I was slightly petrified for my life at one point. DON'T PUT IT BY YOUR NOSE OR EYES!!! I breathed some into my nose and it started bubbling up; and I almost got my eyes engulfed in bubbles. I found it extremely difficult to get the mask off with water, it started getting super soap like. I probably put too much on or something since the instructions are in korean and I didn't know what I was doing. However, the mask made my skin SO SOFT and clean

THIS STUFF IS AMAZING. Seriously. Using this in combination with some pore strips, my pores have shrunken so much on my nose! Also, it makes for hilarious selfies. I let it keep bubbling pretty long one day (lost track of time) and I looked like the Thing from Fantastic 4 lol. But really for the price of this stuff, it is 100% worth it. I don't think I'll buy another pore mask ever. It is a little bit difficult to wash off in the sink though, so I recommend doing it before you get in the shower as it's much easier to wash off that way.

It tickles! I've never tried anything like this before. It's like a mousse texture, but turns into a fizzy foam on your face after a few minutes. My boyfriend was scared to look at me. Said I looked like a gargoyle! haha! This would be a fun product for a girl's night in, or to give as a gift to your beauty product-loving friends. It was a little hard to rinse off with hands. Better to use a washcloth. Wipe the sink down afterward too. It left my face soft and smooth.

I LOVE this product! You can definitely feel (and see!) it working right away. I love how smooth and moisturized my face feels after using this. You do have to move fast when you're putting it on because it starts to work immediately. It comes with a small applicator stick which didn't work well for me. I suggest using a medium sized makeup brush or even just your fingers really, it's just a little messy. Unlike a lot of other products, this doesn't leave your face feeling super dry afterwards which is really great. I definitely recommend this face wash!

reviews.review_header: This is a good mask! It feels kind of itchy while it's ...
reviews.review_text: This is a good mask! It feels kind of itchy while it's bubbling up on the skin, but that was expected. It's easy to get off and leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. If you use this product, make sure to rub in the bubbles before wiping it off to leave your skin felling super moisturized!

reviews.review_header: Instructions aren't in English, otherwise very good
reviews.review_text: The instructions on the packaging are NOT in English. I had to use my phone the first few times (the instructions are in English on Amazon) to make sure I was doing the right thing... It feels a little weird when it starts to bubble up but I do think it works pretty well. Also, I have very sensitive skin and it didn't make me break out in a rash

reviews.review_header: The next day, not so great
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this product didn't work for me. I have oily skin. I had decided to give this item a shot because I had heard great things about it. I'm giving 3 stars because I did have a bad reaction. I only applied it to the right side of my face and after removing the product my skin felt soft and looked brighter. However, the next morning I had a breakout in the same area. This has just been my personal experience.

BABY BUTT SOFT SKIN. The product is definitely fun to use and it delivers the result. The clay texture is so rich and luxurious, it takes a little more time to clean off. I try to use this once a week for a deep clean. It does not dry out my skin, so what's not to like?

reviews.review_header: Not only is it super fun but it cleared up my skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most magical product! Not only is it super fun but it cleared up my skin. I have generally really good skin except for the pores on my nose. This cleared out my pores and shrunk them after only one use. My face is so smooth. Im buying this for all my friends!
Second time I purchased this product because it is the only mask that truly cleans out your pores. It's a lot of fun to watch yourself morph into a monster! Great product!

reviews.review_header: helps with blackheads! Can be itchy in some areas during use (but doesn't irritate skin)
reviews.review_text: This makes my skin feel really nice and hasn't broken me out. It really helps clear out my pores. But for some reason, when the product is on my face the fizzing makes me SO uncomfortably itchy if it's near my nostrils, lips, or eyebrows. Not an allergic reaction since my skin itself doesn't get irritated at all.

reviews.review_header: Very fun to put on and watch it bubble
reviews.review_text: Very fun to put on and watch it bubble. It is very hard on skin though. My face would be extremely red after I would use it. It also is hard to get off if you put a little too much on. If you have sensitive skin you will want to pass on getting this.
I cannot believe how clean this makes my face feel. It really is amazing...LOVE this product. If you have breakouts, I recommend trying this...

reviews.review_header: I use it all the time and my skin looks amazing afterwards. Favorite face mask to date
reviews.review_text: This stuff is GOD SENT. I use it all the time and my skin looks amazing afterwards. Favorite face mask to date, for sure. The bubbles tickle and it’s almost too much to handle sometimes, but for the glowing skin it gives me I deal with it. I’ve bought this mask for multiple friends and they all love it.

At first I loved it, thought the bubbles were fun. But after using it for 3 days I broke out like a teenager. It has been 3 months now and I’m still fighting severe acne from it. I let 2 of my coworkers try right after I bought it and it make their skin horrible too. I tried to give this away but no one would try it due to our experiences so I had to throw it away.

Ive used it twice now. Meh its okay. I have a combination of dry and oily skin. Oily T Zone. Smells like soap. Yes it may look fun/funny. But overall I feel like I washed my face. I dont feel like it does that much. I like the dead sea mud mask better.

This mask came in a week and it works really great! When I removed the mask I immediately felt the difference, my skin was soft and less red. It is very fun to apply but make sure to cover the mask with its cap because it turns foamy very quickly.
