This is a really cool product. The first time I used it, i broke out (as expected) so plan for that. I believe the suggested useage is twice per week, so stick to that to keep cleansed. I coildnt read the instructions on the packaging (again, as expected) but the instructions on the product description here were perfect. Be sure to have a few wash cloths handy to wipe the dipping stick each time. That will keep the whole thing from bubbling up.

I LOVE skincare, especially masks, and I have a pretty extensive collection of products from drugstore to high-end. This is for sure one of my absolute favorites. It transforms from a creamy, pudding-like mud to a crazy oxygenated foam that you have to see to believe. Not only is this mask fun/experiential, it actually works. I use it on days when my skin looks dull and tired and it gives me life -- my skin looks brighter, refreshed and more awake. I would compare it to bliss triple oxygen mask.

reviews.review_header: it does tickle and feel like there's bugs running around on your face
reviews.review_text: So I actually saw a video on FB with someone using this and I really, really wanted to try it. To begin I have slightly sensitive/irritable, combination skin. I'm super-duper oily in my T-zone and dry on my cheeks with a ton of blackheads on my nose. This mask caused me no irritation or discomfort, it does tickle and feel like there's bugs running around on your face. I did not see significant improvement in my skin after the first use but my skin was definitely much softer and clean. For the price it is a great buy and I would say this is definitely my 2nd favorite mask. (My first favorite costs $60 though...) This comes with the product in a plastic jar with a little putty spoon in the lid. I first used my sensitive skin formula face wash and patted my face dry. I then used the putty-spoon to apply this to my face focusing first on my T zone. It began bubbling and fizzing up immediately as it touched my skin, but not while on the spoon or in the jar which was really cool. I let it sit for like 5-6 minutes and it literally bubbled up from probably a centimeter off my skin to about an inch! Be careful putting this around your nose and eyes because it gets big. I rubbed it back in and let it sit for another minute before rinsing it off. I was surprised at how easily it rinsed off the skin. Overall I loved this product and it definitely makes your skin softer and cleanses. I used a biore strip after using this mask and pulled nothing off my face. It's definitely worth the buy, if not for the cleansing power than for the experience of using a carbonated face mask.

reviews.review_header: Fun. But. Be aware if you have sensitive skin.
reviews.review_text: My friend sweated by this. It looked fun so I went ahead and purchased it. First time I did it it was very fun and ticklish. I didn't see much benefit from it. Tried it on my two best friends. They said it made their skin tighter and their pores smaller. So I decided to give it another go. My face broke out. I guess I have really sensitive skin. I will give it one last try or it's going straight to mt friend's house.

reviews.review_header: This mask is fun! I loved it and thought it felt neat
reviews.review_text: This mask is fun! I loved it and thought it felt neat. My husband didn’t. It tickled his face and he couldn’t stand it for more than 30 seconds. It’s easier to put on with your finger rather than the spatula. I think this would be great if you had a young daughter that wanted to be pampered because of the bubbles it creates. It smelled great and left my face soft and clean.

reviews.review_header: but I am super ticklish & it is hard to leave the product ...
reviews.review_text: Obviously the product bubbles, but I am super ticklish & it is hard to leave the product on long enough to do any good. It is also super goopy & messy. I didn't notice any difference in my skin texture or cleanliness. I was super disappointed in the small size & price for that size. Good idea, just not for me.

reviews.review_header: This was way too much fun
reviews.review_text: Idk if it actually benefits my skin long term, but it makes my face soft right after and it was hilarious.

reviews.review_header: but so much fun to use
reviews.review_text: This face mask is so strange, but so much fun to use! I love the feeling of my face after I use it! My face feels clean and soft. The only issue I have with this product is that it is sometimes tricky to get off cleanly. It takes a little work to get it all off well. It is fun to watch it foam up on your face as you're waiting for the time to go by. I would probably get this again!

I loved this mask! It tingles and tickles but makes my skin feel so clean. Only had 1 of 5 of my friends had any skin irritation. If you have known allergies you may want to find a list of the ingredients in English first

Have a love/hate relationship with this product. Yes, it is fun and bubbly, but I guess I always leave it on too long. Difficult to remove and makes a mess in your bathroom - hard to clean. Other masks have done more for my face.
I love, love, love this mask! Not only does it work but it is super fun to use!!!! Thrilled with this purchase from my boyfriend. We are face mask junkies and we give this a 5 star!!

reviews.review_header: but this helps a lot for long enough to go out to dinner and is really fun to put on
reviews.review_text: Nothing is going to make me look younger for long without major surgery, but this helps a lot for long enough to go out to dinner and is really fun to put on....Kind of like heavy, bubbly grout for the skin.

reviews.review_header: It is so cool and tickles a little as it first starts to ...
reviews.review_text: This masks leaves my skin smooth. Make sure you use the applicator to apply the mask so the jar doesn't start to bubble up! It is so cool and tickles a little as it first starts to bubble. This mask is a great deal for $10!

reviews.review_header: My face felt pretty good after it but not much more amazing than ...
reviews.review_text: So bubbly! My wife and I did this one night because she insisted I try it too. It tingles and foams a lot. My face felt pretty good after it but not much more amazing than if I just used a good face scrub

reviews.review_header: I like this but I have oily skin with congested pores ...
reviews.review_text: Overall, I like this but I have oily skin with congested pores - especially around my nose. It’s not really a mask, more of a foaming face wash that you are only supposed to leave on for 5 minutes max. Careful though, it can irritate sensitive skin.

reviews.review_header: Fun, but I'm not sure how much it actually ...
reviews.review_text: Fun, but I'm not sure how much it actually does. Bubbles a little too much for my taste as well; tickles too much to keep on for long. Don't regret trying it but don't think I would buy again

This item arrived quickly and despite what other reviewers have said, there were English instructions. I did like this product but after putting on, I was only able to leave it on for not even the 3 minutes. I experienced the crazy tingling sensation, especially around my nose, but also some mild burning which wasn't too bad. After rinsing, my face was very smooth and did look great. If you have very sensitive skin though I'd probably steer clear.

reviews.review_header: Makes my skin feel super soft and clean
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin feel super soft and clean. My daughter and I love it and get a kick out of the way it bubbles up.

reviews.review_header: I had a high expectation because people kept saying how good of a product this was
reviews.review_text: I don't get the hype for this product. I had a high expectation because people kept saying how good of a product this was. I tried this and it's not worth it!!! I put it on and I like how bubbles started and there's tingly feeling on my face. I was hoping that while it was on my face, it was doing it's magic, but unfortunately not. I was so sad about the end result. Nothing really happen on the end. I think people like the fact that this mask is different from other mask out there by being carbonated clay mask. It did clean my pores or any what it supposed to do. SO SAD.

So much fun!! The bubbles on your face are so fun! My whole family loves doing this mask. My niece ran around squealing with excitement as the mask grew on her face. Leaves your face feeling so soft!!
It's so fun to use!! I'm going to get it again. Don't use it too often or leave it on longer than directed or it'll dry out your skin and cause break outs.
I did this mask on Sunday. It's now Friday and I've been breaking out EVERY DAY SINCE 👎🏻

reviews.review_header: What a fun mask! It takes a little while to bubble
reviews.review_text: What a fun mask! It takes a little while to bubble, but feels great when it does. I follow up with a little spray of Evian, and it gives skin a nice glow. A definite repurchase for at home pampering.

This s*** is so fun! I love it!! My face feels so re-freshened and anew after I use it. The only thing is maybe don't apply closely under the eyes or near the lips. One: it grows a bit and can get onto your eyelashes/in your eye. Two: it REALLY TICKLES near my lips! But overall a great product.

I liked that the mask was very simple to use and left my face feeling clean and smooth. My shin also feels very nourished after I use the mask. Normally after washing your face and your face dries your shin feels like it needs more moisture and you end up needing to apply lotion. With this mask moisture is not a problem at all. I love the mask and it has helped tremendously with my break outs and black heads.

I love it! It cleans my skin like it's nobody's business, and it leaves it smoother than any other product. Doesn't dry too much, doesn't irritate, leaves no residue. It is one of the best products I tried lately, and I have tried lots of masks until now. In fact I use it before I apply any other mask, because I feel it prepares the skin for better absorption of whatever I put on next. This is by far one of the best ways to clean and smooth your skin. Will keep rebuying it.

reviews.review_header: Only appeal is that the mask bubbles. It doesn't ...
reviews.review_text: Only appeal is that the mask bubbles. It doesn't do anything beneficial for your skin. It was a pain to take off my face and burned. Same thing happened with my fiance. After applying once to my face, I won't use it again.
I recommend this product I really like it. I feel my face more clean and more soft
Be prepared to have the most uncomfortable 10 minutes of your life!!! Imagine being tickled and having to scratch your nose but cannot. That is this facemask.

reviews.review_header: It cleans the best. You can literally feel your pores clearing as ...
reviews.review_text: If i could give this 10 stars i would. This stuff does wonders. I have sensitive skin, though this does not irritate. It cleans the best. You can literally feel your pores clearing as it bubbles. it tickles a bit, but it is well worth it. And it leaves your skin feeling SOOO soft!

reviews.review_header: I wasn't expecting a whole lot just thought it'd be fun to try with my daughter
reviews.review_text: Kind of weird lol. Doesn't seem to do much. It foams very fast, so put on quickly. Won't buy again. I wasn't expecting a whole lot just thought it'd be fun to try with my daughter. Makes your face really itchy as it foams so she really didn't like it.

reviews.review_header: Makes my face feel very soft after. It is ...
reviews.review_text: Makes my face feel very soft after. It is incredibly tingly and tickles my face while using it, which is almost unbearable, but I know that is just the mask working its' magic!

reviews.review_header: Bubbles up very fast, so you have to work quickly!
reviews.review_text: Elizavecca Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay mask is a Korean brand product which has been a popular product in Asia. I've heard a lot about this bubble clay mask from other people and on-line and I saw it at local Korean cosmetic shops. The cost to buy from local shops is way more expansive than buying it on Amazon. I decided to give it a try since it is relatively cheap on Amazon and it has prime shipping. I had no idea what to expect the first time I used it. I used the plastic spatula included to scoop out a quarter size amount. Then I used my fingers to spread it across my face. As soon as the mask touch my face it started to bubble and foam very quickly. Before I could finish covering my entire face, the part of my face that was covered earlier has already completely foamed up. So, you have to work very quickly. The second time I used it, I worked much faster and it was okay. I noticed my skin appears smoother after use. Some reviewer said their pores seems to shrink but I have to say I haven't noticed significant change in pore size. Maybe I haven't use it enough to notice a difference yet. I do feel like the mask pulls out the dirt in my poles and my face feels fresh and clean after using it. Overall, I would recommend this bubble clay mask.

This was fun to use but ..... it got bubbly and make my nose itch . Not fun! Then I left this on my bathroom and when I opened it it was foam and not the mask ... im assuming bc of the humidity.. maybe ... idk ! I ended up throwing it out bc it was all foamy

Love putting it on but dries my skin out. This seems more like a novelty item. I use it only once a week if that because of how dry my skin gets. I normally have oily skin. I would be wary if you have sensitive skin and use this. Also felt like it made me break out more. Once this runs out, I will not be buying again.

I love this mask! I love the tingly feeling it give off while it bubbles! I'm always left with super baby butt soft skin afterwards. The first time using it I found it a bit hard to wash off because it becomes kind of slimy but I now use my clairasonic to remove it after messaging the bubbles away.

Love this mask! It doesn't require applying a lot of the product like other do. After a few minutes the mask starts to foam, it really feels like it's cleaning out your pores. Once I'm done and I wash all of it off with warm water my face feels soft for hours. It's definitely not an everyday face mask, I use it once or twice a week.
Fun to use. Scent is nice and not overly strong or perfumey. Leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth. Will definitely purchase again.

Purchased as a gift for a friend who LOVES this product. For her, there has been no irritation or breakouts while using this item. She has combination skin and after the mask is gently removed she applies a facial moisturizer. I'm 100% happy with this purchase 😆

At first I thought it was nothing special, but after a few weeks of using it 1-2 times a week, I noticed my skin looked and felt amazing. It gave me a beautiful glow and made my skin so soft after. Only downside it's a pretty small container.
SEVERE allergic reaction to the mask and my skin is not even sensitive!!! My face is bright red and terribly itchy. Too bad I can't return it.

reviews.review_header: As a mask its okay not the best, but for a fun factor AWESOME
reviews.review_text: As a mask its okay not the best, but for a fun factor AWESOME. Prepare to have your camera ready for a funny selfie, cute for a girls spa night.

I purchased this thinking it would clean my face really good as it has clay in it, I'm not positive as ive only used it once at how good it cleanses but it does carbonate an tickle an just weird feeling in general on my face, also when washing of it continues to foam up trying to wash it off.

reviews.review_header: my face feels normal after not squeaky clean like oter products i've used
reviews.review_text: my face feels normal after not squeaky clean like oter products i've used. Nothing beats the real clay mask, i feel like these are for kids because it's fun and it tingles in the process of it drying.

This is such a fun mask! It has a jelly like consistency that you spread over your face and then it starts to bubble and foam. I guess you leave it on until it stops bubbling. The only thing was that it starts to tickle my nose so that I have to scratch it. Next time I won't put it so close to my nose!

reviews.review_header: It's so much fun and it does clean your face
reviews.review_text: It's so much fun and it does clean your face, i recommend using steam to open up your pores and then applying the mask, and/or use an exfoliating brush or sponge to massage your face. Over all I recommend it for a nice clean feeling. Use it every other day tho, not every day if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_header: So I'm pretty in love with this product
reviews.review_text: So I'm pretty in love with this product. It was fun the first couple times that I used it since the bubbles really make your skin feel strange. The overall feeling is a really clean one, though, especially after you wash it off and put moisturizer on. My skin feels so soft whenever I use it. The only qualm I have about the mask is that it doesn't bubble anymore when I use it, so now it's basically just a normal clay mask that I put on whenever I feel like it. I'm a little disappointed that the 'fun' aspect of the mask is gone, but it's still a pleasure to use and I'd buy it again.

reviews.review_header: My sister in law said it worked great and was really fun
reviews.review_text: Everyone was really excited to receive this as a gift! My sister in law said it worked great and was really fun! Kind of wish I would of bought some for myself.
Love this product, this has become apart of my cleansing. It really cleans the oil out of my pores.

reviews.review_header: Love this bubbling clay carbonated mask
reviews.review_text: Love this bubbling clay carbonated mask. I bought this product about a year ago and loved it. I was telling my friend about it so I bought it for him and he loved it as well. This is a unique item and I think one that's worth trying out.

reviews.review_header: DO IT!!!! You will love this!!!! SO FUN!
reviews.review_text: This was amazing!!! LOVE IT!!! will buy again!!! DO IT DO IT DO IT!!! so fun! use with girl friends or husbands... fun and your face feels fab when you're done! EASY and FUN! perfect for ANY AGE!!!! Best if washed off in shower, a bit messy!

reviews.review_header: It is very fun and feels good but when you putting them on ...
reviews.review_text: It is very fun and feels good but when you putting them on your face, the mask IN THE JAR also starts carbonated. By the time I half finish the jar, it didn't bubble up like first time.

reviews.review_header: It makes me feel so much better after using it
reviews.review_text: It makes me feel so much better after using it. my skin is super soft for days. I would recommend showering while washing this off as its thick and uses a lot of water to get it all off. the good thing is that i dont have to use a lot of it.

Absolutely in love with this product. I wasn't too sure what to expect but it sure wasn't what I got. I have light to medium acne scars all over my cheeks and after the first use of it my scars were visibly lessened. It tickles when your using it but it does amazing things for my skin and after using it my face was so much softer than it was before. I will be buying this again

reviews.review_header: It feels like I have a charlie horse on my face
reviews.review_text: My face feels clean after using. It is really bothersome once it starts foaming. It feels like I have a charlie horse on my face. It is kind of difficult to get off. You have to "scrape" it off with the side of your hand. Do not put underneath nose.... very uncomfortable.

reviews.review_header: This product was a lot of fun to use
reviews.review_text: This product was a lot of fun to use! But you need to put it on in a timely manner because it starts working really fast and then it's hard to continue to put it on the rest of your face when that starts happening.

This stuff is amazing!!! Used it for a "Girls Pamper Night" party and we had so much fun. It tingles and tickles and it looks crazy but the end result is pretty impressive. Makes skin feel so soft and so clean. Definitely a 5 star product! Plus, they include all these free samples of other stuff in the box.

reviews.review_header: Bubbly and fun and a bit itchy
reviews.review_text: I bought two of these, both as a gift. My friend FaceTimed me while using it, when it was all bubbles up, and he said that it felt itchy. My sister used it and said that it made her feel like it was constantly going to melt off of her face. ( Not melt her face off, the product melt off of her face.) Great bubbling results, no sticky residue on face, messy to clean up, and a fun gift.

reviews.review_header: It’s good for your skin & it’s FUN!
reviews.review_text: This is a good deep cleaner for once a week or once a month - depending on your skin type. I love the tingly feeling on your face when the bubbles are forming. It feels like someone rubbed a bird feather on you. I usually leave plan for ten minutes then rinse with warm water. After frying my face, which feels as soft as a baby bum, I put on my eye cream then mositirizer on face and neck and call it a night. I love this product and recommend to anyone!
This is the best mud mask ive ever tried. Nothing came close to getting all my oil out and smooth my skin after one use. I cannot wait to use it daily and see the results
I liked this product. Not sure if it did anything for my skin, but I read reviews and said that it takes a few applications. I'll update my review soon with long term results.

I love this stuff! It really gives your face a deep clean and you'll see a noticeable difference after one use. There were no English instructions on the box and so I had to google how long I needed to keep it on for. U need to keep it on for 5 mins until it foams which tickles by the way, then rub it in and wait 2 more mins before washing it off. It does not wash off easy, I usually get a small towel, wet it and wipe it off

My fiance and I tried this. We had fun with it first off, the smell is clean and not over powering like most cleansers. The carbonation was fun! Made my skin soft and smooth. Did not dry out my skin like most cleansers do. Highly reccomend. I have combination skin btw!

This stuff is so awesome! You never really understand the bubbles until you actually use it yourself -- so crazy!! I was so intrigued by this product that I made my husband put some on too! It is best to put it on before you are getting in the shower though because it takes FOREVER to rinse off otherwise! Overall, left my face feeling fantastic and the bubbles really seemed like it was cleaning deep in my pores!

reviews.review_header: This was so fun to use
reviews.review_text: This was so fun to use! I didn't quite know what to expect, so it was sure a fun surprise when I tried it and it turned out to be really quite neat to watch as it turns from a mud like paste to foam like bubbles all over your face. My face does seem smoother after I use it.

reviews.review_header: I'm not sure what the benefits of this stuff is supposed to be, but it's definitely fun to use.
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure what the benefits of this stuff is supposed to be, but it's definitely fun to use. The foaming action, once applied to the face, is a lot of fun. I probably won't buy again since I'm not sure what the purpose is, but I did enjoy it.

reviews.review_header: Carbonated mask for super soft skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical buying this as someone with massive pores I've been let down by products time and time again. I brought this on a whim and I honestly do not regret it, not does the mask visibly reduce the size of my pores it leave my skin feeling so soft I will definitely be trying more Korean products

I love this product so incredibly much! It smells wonderful. It's fun to use. The packaging is adorable. (I mean, it's got a little pig with a clay mask on its face. What's not to love about that?) I love the way this mask makes my skin feel. There's no tightness or overdrawing which can occur with other clay masks. Instead, when I rinse it off, my skin feels soft, supple, and clean. I couldn't be more pleased with this product. (It ships from Korea, I think, so expect that shipping will take a while and be patient.)

reviews.review_header: So much fun! and it WORKS
reviews.review_text: If you dont have this...YOU NEED IT!!!! My skin feels so soft after using this I could tell a difference right away. Its a fun product to use. I've done about 6 masks now and still have half the jar left. I also put it on pretty thick, I would say one container would be good for 18-20 masks depending on how much you use. GREAT PRODUCT!

reviews.review_header: This face mask is the best I ever used
reviews.review_text: Very nice products love the way my face look after used this product I don’t leave it more than five minutes because it start to feel like a burning sensation but besides that is great I used only one time a week . Hope my review help you to you won’t regret the money spend on it..

reviews.review_header: Omg I love this! I have lots of funny pictures with ...
reviews.review_text: Omg I love this! I have lots of funny pictures with it, too! My teenage brother loves what this stuff does for his skin (especially while going through puberty!) Definitely tickles your face, but man does your skin look good after. Plus it's fun!

reviews.review_header: This is a fun product, I love it
reviews.review_text: This is a fun product, I love it! It is a very deep cleaning mask so I would recommend not using it everyday. I use it once to twice a week. It cleans my skin really well and clears up any black heads I may have. I recommend it:)

This mask is absolutely amazing, I love how it tingles as it bubbles and foams up, and how clean and firm my skin feels after using it. It's not the kind of mask you can really wear while doing other things, since it's on the messy side, but that doesn't stop me from using it every few days.
Bought this so me and my 16-year-old sister could have some fun. Was actually surprised at how clean my face felt afterwards. Definitely makes for some funny pictures to send to your friends!

reviews.review_header: I do like the texture and the bubble effect
reviews.review_text: My skin does feel a lot soft after applying this mask. I try to put it on once a week, and it's definitely a unique experience. I'm not sure how well it works to fight acne because I didn't have any before/after applying this mask. I do like the texture and the bubble effect!

Can't really say the "carbonation" has an effect on your skin, but at it's core, it's a nice, soothing clay mask. It smells nice and it feels nice going on. I have mildly sensitive skin and I felt a good tingle and was ready to take it off after about 7 minutes.
I’ve read many rave reviews of this product, but you should know- it’s not amazing for everyone. This irritated my skin and caused itching, breakouts. Not a favorite of mine.

reviews.review_header: This is the most fun thing ever
reviews.review_text: This is the most fun thing ever! It really does what it says. It has a carbonation effect that fizzes up right before your eyes and onto your skin! It mad me look like a rain cloud monster! Was so fun & my face felt super clean after! Make sure to use a deep moisturizer afterwards!
I love this mask.... it's not only great as a mask, it's pretty fun using too. My skin feels amazing afterwards.... used it twice so far and no skin issues at all.

Such a fun mask! You have to apply quickly, as it starts to foam immediately. It tickles/itches, but sit it out, it's worth it! I let it foam to it's max potential, then wet my hands and pat down all the bubbles so that the mask looks like a regular clay mask, which I continue to wear until it is dry. I really enjoy this mask!

reviews.review_header: Love the bubbling effect of this mask
reviews.review_text: Love the bubbling effect of this mask. Makes my face feel clean and refreshed. It's just difficult to wash off the mask after.

reviews.review_header: I love using this so much
reviews.review_text: I love using this so much. After it’s done I lightly rinse off the bubbles and rub in the mask more with what’s left and leave it for a little longer. Seems to work better that way.

reviews.review_header: It just felt like it wasn't strong enough
reviews.review_text: Not very efficient for acne-prone skin. Doesn't really do the job. It just felt like it wasn't strong enough. It just fizzles...

reviews.review_header: Lots of bubbles worth a little mess 😀
reviews.review_text: It was nicely packaged, came on time and fun to watch bubble up, my only advice is do it before a shower caise it creams back up when you wash it off so my sink got a little messy but afterwards when my face dried it was so smoothe, after i used the charcoal mask which yes hurts a bit to pull off but gets all the deep gunk out and now I have soft skin and no blackheads... use these 2 products and it's a win win

reviews.review_header: I love the way the bubbles make your face feel
reviews.review_text: This mask arrived today and I immediately had to try it. I love the way the bubbles make your face feel. The lightly tickle and make it feel like it's working magic. My face looked refreshed and brighter after using. If you love face masks I highly recommend this one.

reviews.review_header: Other than that I recommend the product my face is much smoother and brighter
reviews.review_text: Make sure to close the product as soon as you're not using it. When it comes in contact with the air it starts to bubble. Other than that I recommend the product my face is much smoother and brighter.

reviews.review_header: This product is so fun to use as a face mask and leaves the ...
reviews.review_text: Haven't seen two much of a difference but I also don't hardly have any blackheads. This product is so fun to use and leaves the skin feeling smooth and refresh!

reviews.review_header: ... excited about this purchase but after opening it looks like straight jello
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about this purchase but after opening it looks like straight jello. Can't apply to my face. I also wish the ingredients were in English but that was my mistake not looking into that first.

Amazing product. It took a few uses to get used to the tingly, tickling sensation of the bubbles. After each use, my pores look smaller and my skin feels tighter. I am noticeably smoother after each use and have introduced several of my friends to it. Speechless that a product at this price point can do so much.

reviews.review_header: ... pop rocks on my face) but it felt more like a foam
reviews.review_text: I was expecting this big amount of carbonated bubbles (like pop rocks on my face) but it felt more like a foam. I didn't notice any distinct bubbling action but it did foam up. I used a thin amount so maybe if you use more you will get more bubble action. My face did feel nice and soft after.

This mask is pretty cool. The directions weren't in English but less is more with this product. It will grow substantially. It's light weight and doesn't have an overpowering smell. Will definitely be using this again

reviews.review_header: Perfect for oilier skin types with larger pores
reviews.review_text: After thoroughly researching ingredients and how to use this product, I bought it for my daughter and I. It delivers a tingly sensation (hence the carbonation) which allows for better absorption into the follicles. It's base dries as clay that adheres to sebum. After 10min and a good warm water rinse, our skin not only felt fresh but we both experienced a noticeably brighter complexion and tighter pores!

I love this product. It’s so much fun!!! I had to buy it a second time when my first jar ran out. The only downside is that it tingles, but (in my personal opinion) not in a nice way. Something about the sensation makes my skin crawl. But again, this is a repeat purchase for me, so don’t take too much stock in that...

reviews.review_header: I love this so much- not only is the packaging adorable
reviews.review_text: I love this so much- not only is the packaging adorable, but the product is effective. I've never seen a charcoal product that foams before. I love how it incorporates the bubbling aspect and really works into the pores.

This product was on my list for a while after hearing much about it on Buzzfeed and other social medias I knew it was definitely something I wanted to try but didn't want to necessarily drop $20 on a face mask. I am so glad I splurged and finally got this mask. While it was foaming on my face it was a very itchy feeling but once you wash it off my skin felt amazing and I couldn't wait to put the mask on again. Highly recommend this product!!!

reviews.review_header: This stuff is pretty fun to use and it gets my face nice ...
reviews.review_text: This stuff is pretty fun to use and it gets my face nice and clean before I moisturize. Scoop out however much you need and close the lid quickly, this stuff really does bubble up and it not as drying as other face washes.

reviews.review_header: This mask is so fun. It bubbles as it cleanses
reviews.review_text: This mask is so fun. It bubbles as it cleanses. It kind of tickles but its cool! We all enjoy using it and getting a good laugh out of it. My teenager enjoyed getting this for Christmas! Keep it away from the eyes and lips though! The bubbles definately bubble!

I absolutely love this product. My face feels so clean and soft and supple after using this bubble mask! The "bubble" sensation does tickle and the very first time I tried this mask, I was not sure I liked the feeling. However, now i love it!

reviews.review_header: Good product but not for me
reviews.review_text: I really like how easy it was to put on it wasn’t too hard but it didn’t really help with my skin instead I broke out even more. But I don’t blame the product my skin is just really sensitive. I haven’t used it since I’ve used it about 4 times and instead gave it to my sister. But other than that I liked how it foamed up in bubbles I thought it was pretty fun to use just wished it would have worked for me.

reviews.review_header: it bubbles and that's kinda fun and silly
reviews.review_text: Ohhhhh y'all this mask is heavenly. Yes, it bubbles and that's kinda fun and silly, but it also left my pores feeling super clean, my skin soft, and my tone even. Great for enlarged pores and blackheads.

I loved this product! The mask was super fun to use and it made my skin baby soft. It bubbles up once you apply, so if your ticklish this may not be the product for you. I recommend using an almond size scoop because it is a pay to wash off. So I would do this once I was going to take a shower. My pores felt clean, which was nice. I wouldn't say it was a clay mask because it doesn't really harden, but it wasn't bad either.

This product is good. It makes your skin really really smooth and soft. You'll have to work fast or else it'll bubble up. What I recommend is that when you put this on, close the jar right away or it'll bubble up in the jar and it'll be a waste. What I also suggest you do is don't put some around your nostrils or otherwise it'll bubble up and becoming really annoying. It'll become ichy. I gave this 4 stars because I used this for a while now and it doesn't get rid of pores as it says. Well, I guess it takes some dirt away but not a lot. This product does makes your skin really soft so that's good. Great product though, 10/10 would buy again :))

I will say before proceeding with this review that my skin did feel incredibly softer after using this product and that my pores did look smaller. However, instructions say to leave the mask on for about 5-10 minutes. Letting the product foam, massaging it into skin, and then rinsing off. I'm not sure if it's because I applied too much product on my face- but when it started to tingle and tickle my face, it was soo annoying. I couldn't stand the feeling. My entire face felt itchy. I normally wouldn't classify my skin as sensitive, but I couldn't handle the tingling sensation on my face. It felt like I had spiders crawling all over. I give the 4 stars because it made my skin softer. I'm going to give it another try, but without as much product.
Did this mask for fun with a friend and our kids. Felt silly, entertained us for a while and good for laughs. Skin felt a little smother but that's not why I bought it. Purely for entertainment.

reviews.review_header: The bubbly feeling tickles my face and I cannot leave ...
reviews.review_text: The bubbly feeling tickles my face and I cannot leave it on for long before I'm itchy and it's driving my crazy. It leaves my face leaving smooth and clear, but it's not anything out of this world, I wouldn't be eager to purchase again.

reviews.review_header: it works extremely well and is a lot of fun to use
reviews.review_text: The pros: it works extremely well and is a lot of fun to use. It bubbles up zits I can see and starts to get rid of ones that haven't even come to the surface yet. I use it at least once a week. The cons: it does sting a little when it's on, and the areas where you have the most acne will be red and a little sore after you've used it, but that really isn't a huge con for me.

reviews.review_header: It was fun to apply and watch it bubble
reviews.review_text: It was fun to apply and watch it bubble. But other then that it’s slightky hyped. A bit hard to take off if u let it dry. It was fun to use it on everyone once and watch their reaction. But I will not be purchasing it again

reviews.review_header: Not gonna lie it's a great mask but it will give you low self esteem ...
reviews.review_text: Not gonna lie it's a great mask but it will give you low self esteem when it bubbles out of control on some and not others. Family consensus.

reviews.review_header: The idea of it looked pretty fresh. I tried this after I received it ...
reviews.review_text: I purchased this a while back after watching a video. The idea of it looked pretty fresh. I tried this after I received it in the mail, and it does get kinda itchy because of the bubbles forming. The only part I didn't like was that it was hard washing it off. After I washed it off, my skin did look cleaner, but i didn't see a big difference. Maybe I need to use it more often, but I'll continue using it.

reviews.review_header: Fun to use, but can be a bit too dry for some
reviews.review_text: I admit I bought this mask because I saw a video review of it and it looks so cool when it bubbles that I really wanted to give it a try. I tried it with my sisters and we had a ton of fun with it. I put a light layer of he mask on and after a few minutes, I can really feel it starting to bubble. Such an interesting feeling! My sister put on a much thicker layer and when the mask bubbled, it looked so horrifying! When it came time to washing the mask off, that was a bit difficult. I had to wash a few times to really get everything off. My sister had a much harder time because she had more on. After washing it off, my face felt nice and soft. However, my sister says the mask is too dehydrating for her. She says her face felt too dry after using the mask. Not sure if it's because she used more of the it than I did. My skin type is normal and my sister's is combination with oily T zone and normal elsewhere. *** Update 2/5/2017 *** One tip to easily get the mask off the face is to wash it off with a face towel. I find this works much better than trying to wash it off with just water.

It was fun the first time, but I would not advise it for people with sensitive skin. It did dry out my cheeks and left them a little red, so now I just avoid those areas and I'm fine. But it also does not bubble half as much as it used too, which is kind of a bummer.

This is a really fun face mask. It goes on easily and feels great. The bubbles will tickle tho and it does expand so be careful going to close to your nostrils. It makes your skin feel amazing. Absolutely love it.
Love love love!!! Removed black heads, had a breakout after first use..but that's expected with a good facial or cleanser. Again LOVE!!!

reviews.review_header: Lot's of fun, but not a "Must Have"
reviews.review_text: Read the instructions and make sure you seal the product after use. Skin felt smooth, but over-the-counter masks work just as well. Lots of fun
This made my face itch when I used it. Wasn't sure of it was just me but my friend said the same thing as well. I don't usually have issues with skin products but I removed it right away.
Does nothing for my pores but it does make my skin softer. It's very difficult to wash off. I will say it is fun, and I will use it up but probably not buy it again.

Such an amazing product! To be quite honest I wasn't expecting it to actually bubble up on your face but it does...within SECONDS!!! Just make sure not to keep it on for too long because it's hard to take it off afterwards. I highly recommend this product, it does an amazing job of taking off makeup and leaving your skin feeling nice and smooth.
Love this mask! Makes my face look and feel so clean. Actually looks like I just used a lore strip after using. I love to take a shower and then put this on. Works great.

reviews.review_header: It was fun to goop on and yes
reviews.review_text: I saw a ton of reviews for this on Buzzfeed. I'm a sucker for face masks so I thought I'd try it. It's definitely different! It was fun to goop on and yes, it does bubble. I left it on for ten minutes or so and my face felt super clean and refreshed when I wiped it off. Will definitely use again!

reviews.review_header: This mask was super fun to do
reviews.review_text: This mask was super fun to do. Once. After the excitement was gone from playing with it once, it went into my cabinet and never saw the light of day again

This is the 2nd time I buy the bubble mask . I heard about this product from Instagram and was a bit skeptical so I bought it and fell in love . I use it about 2-4 times a week and it doesn’t dry my skin out . Really gets my black heads out and leaves a fresh feeling after I rinse with like warm water . Will buy for the 3rd time :)

reviews.review_header: I had heard all the good things about this mask so was really looking forward ...
reviews.review_text: I had heard all the good things about this mask so was really looking forward to trying it. I have no idea if there is any benefit to it as I could only use it once. The carbonation tickled so bad I couldn't even stand it. I don't know if I am just extra sensitive or what because I don't read that in the reviews so I wanted to mention it because it was such a waste of money for me. :)

I've had oxygen masks before. This stuff really bubble up so don't put too much by your nose😂. Works well. If you wipe the bubbles they come back. Lol. I like it to be honest. Not drying but does a good job getting the skin clear and it's just a fun mask. Close the lid tightly so it doesn't dry out
I used it for almost one week and I feel my face more clean and fresh. UPDATE : After mote than 4 week I can say that it does not offer that much comparing to its cost. Amazon has better options.

reviews.review_header: Fun, but not for sensitive or dry skin
reviews.review_text: I generally don't have incredibly sensitive skin, but this mask is very stripping. It made my skin very tight and even my most gentle products made my skin sting afterward. This was fun but I wouldn't use again.

reviews.review_header: This is a super fun mask
reviews.review_text: This is a super fun mask! It cleared up my blackheads! it was just perfect. It has a pleasant smell and texture, not easy to wash so I put it before showering and I remove it during the shower time.

dude this stuff is seriously amazing. Not only does my face feel incredibly fantastic, but it was the most fun I’ve had in weeks. My boyfriend and i laughed until we cried. I had a sit on my cheek but by the time i washed this off it was GONE! This stuff is freaking magical, it will now be part of my weekly skin routine!! I have crappy skin that breaks out at the drop of a hat, and I’m super into this mask!
I love this mask it makes my face clean and smooth and moisturized. The only thing I don't like about it is that my face gets super itchy when the mask starts bubbling up.

reviews.review_header: I have to say this is fun!!
reviews.review_text: I have to say this is fun!!! It does a good job of cleaning your face and bubbling up. The applicator is really easy to use too. I wasn't really sure how long to keep this on my face because the directions are in another language. I just kept it on until it stopped bubbling up. I will say that it is itchy while its bubbling and its kind of hard to rinse off. Other than that, it works great, especially for the price.

Absolutely love this mask. I highly recommend this if you have oily skin. My skin gets really oily, but after a month of using this my skin isn't so oily and my pores are smaller. I just apply the product to my problem area's. Helped clear my skin up :) Gets a little itchy when it starts to bubble up. Other then that this product is amazing!
While fun I never saw a difference in my skin. Also itched like having bugs all over face

I love using this! It's seriously the funnest mask I've used, and it smells really good too. I've noticed an improvement in my blackheads, but nothing drastic (I have normal sized pores). I knocked down a star because it dries out my skin a little after using, so I follow up with a mosturizer. Overall, it's a nice mask to use though and I would recommend!
I bought this after watching YouTube videos. I was so happy with it. my skin feels amazing and refreshed. My friend used it and it made her nose feel itchy from the bubbles is the only complaint.

I bought this 100% because I saw it in a youtube video.No regrets. The mask does bubble up which is amusing, and I'd describe the sensation as closer to itchy than ticklish. I do like the final rub in which turns the mask into a smooth clay. I don't know if I'll ever run out since you need very little to make it work.

reviews.review_header: This stuff is so much fun! It smells clean
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so much fun! It smells clean, leaves my face soft, and silky feeling. It tickles a bit because of the bubbles popping. I love that you can squish it into your face after the initial time you put it on, and it'll bubble up again! My pores look smaller after use, and I will def be purchasing agian!

This is amazing! And wow it smells so good. And I love how the smell lingers after I have washed it off. It bubbles, and cleans and it's amazing. It makes my face tickle so much lol. I freaking love Korean products. And the packaging is soooo cute. It arrived early and was packaged with care and was exactly as described.
Fun, make skin feel nice but not worth the hype

reviews.review_header: Want to look like a fluffy cloud and get clean
reviews.review_text: Want to look like a fluffy cloud and get clean? This product is for you! A tip I would give is, use as directed. I left this on a little longer than directed because, well I was enjoying being a cloud and I liked the tingling, but my face was kinda itchy and red after I washed it off. The next time I used it, I kept it on for the directed time and I had no issues.
I do recommend to use this before getting in the shower. It does take a while to wash off. But it dose make your skin soft and feel clean.
I love this stuff! Helps keep my skin looking great and it is so fun to use! It kinda tingles! I enjoy this product very much and all of my friends that I've had try it are happy with it.

reviews.review_header: I love it! Noticed a difference since I've started using ...
reviews.review_text: I love it! Noticed a difference since I've started using it. Tingles and itches your face a bit. But amazing nonetheless

This mask is amazing! I have been using a much more expensive mask that I absolutely loved, but I saw this on Buzzfeed and I knew I just had to try it. It did not disappoint. It feels so good while you let it bubble on your skin. I let it sit and bubble for about 10 minutes, then with wet hands, I rubbed the mask into my skin and let it sit another ten. Then I rinsed it off with warm water. My skin was so soft and my blackheads weren't as noticeable. I finished up with my normal night time skincare routine and my skin has felt awesome for a few days.

reviews.review_header: This is such a fun mask and feels so good as it bubbles up
reviews.review_text: This is such a fun mask and feels so good as it bubbles up! The only problem is that when I wash it off it always leaves thick residue on my washcloth and sink. Not enough of a downside for me to not use it, though. I really love how it makes my face feel afterwards.

This product is fun from start to finish. Even its packaging is cute: a pig with a facial mask. That sort of gives you a clue that this is no ordinary mask. The instructions aren't in English, but I saw this in a video on Facebook and it looked easy enough. It comes with a little spoon/ladle that you use to apply the clay. The consistency of the clay is very smooth. It kind of reminded me of cake frosting. Almost immediately after applying it to my face it started to foam up. And it continued to foam up the longer I kept it on my face, which was very amusing. After a few minutes, I rubbed the foamy clay all over until it resembled a normal clay mask and then waited another few minutes. I could still feel it fizzing on my skin which felt tingly. After I finally washed it off, my skin felt firmer and very refreshed. I just started using this so I'm not sure of the long-term results, but I'll be sure to update my review if anything changes. So far I definitely recommend. This would be a lot of fun at sleepovers.
More of a gimmick than anything. It doesn't work any better than a traditional mud mask. I admit, the bubbling is fun though.

Bubbly fun with soft skin, just be careful to not get too close to your eyes and mouth because it keeps growing and can be dangerous but the writing is in a different language and has no instructions or warning labels to tell you that

reviews.review_header: It was pretty good on my skin for short term but long ...
reviews.review_text: It just bubbles up as you put it on - don't wait for it to dry because it will not. It was pretty good on my skin for short term but long term it didn't really do anything.

reviews.review_header: I was very excited to use it after reading all these amazing reviews. Very
reviews.review_text: It burns every time I used it. I don't know if it was just me. I was very excited to use it after reading all these amazing reviews. Very sad

reviews.review_header: This mask is FUN. I was posting to my snapchat while using ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is FUN. I was posting to my snapchat while using it, saying that even if it did nothing for my skin it was still worthwhile just for how fun it is. But it did make my skin feel very nice and soft, and look nice.
Simply fabulous! It takes sometime to notice effect, but it worth of waiting. I strongly recommend the product. It is so beneficial for any skin type. Will buy it again.
no insttrctions unless you can read chinese. Product wasnt okay on the skin it left me face red and burning after 1 minute. It was bad just very bad.

This mask is a trip! Neither i nor my roomate could take eachother seriously with it on while it was bubbling, but once it washed off our skin was super nice! I'd recommend this product so much I am buying some for friends as holiday gifts!
This mask not only makes your skin soft but the tingling bubbles will appeal to your inner child. Lol Really fun mask

reviews.review_header: I absolutely love this clay mask
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this clay mask! I was skeptical about using it at first but I absolutely love it! I'll definitely order this again! You do have to be quick once you apply the mask or else it'll start carbonating but asides from that I love this clay mask.

reviews.review_header: when I washed it off my face felt just as nice as it did with any other mask
reviews.review_text: The carbonation is such a strange feeling and I'm not sure it actually does anything to improve the cleaning, but, when I washed it off my face felt just as nice as it did with any other mask. I'd recommend not putting it directly under your nose or it will be difficult to breathe through your nose.
What's the point of this? Gave me a scary experience. Took me forever to wash off. Only used a thin layer. Overall, skinwas soft and dried out. Not good for combo skin.
Meh... I never noticed any change and now it sits on my desk unused... this product is just a social media trend, don't waste your money on it..

reviews.review_header: This is a super fun mask
reviews.review_text: This is a super fun mask! It tightened my skin and cleared up my blackheads! I did a lot more massaging than was recommended and it was just perfect. It has a pleasant smell and texture, but I wasn't expecting how much it would bubble up! I'm going to be buying more for sure. It's only a shame mine came with the bar code sticker over the English instructions. Overall a very fun experience.

reviews.review_header: I like how fun this product is
reviews.review_text: In addition to keeping you skin clear and refreshed, I like how fun this product is. It bubbles up and makes your face look very funny but it does its job. I also appreciate that this is a very quick clay mask and only takes 5 minutes of your day !

Great mask, super quick only takes about 5 minutes which is nice but it makes my face feel cleaner than any mask I've ever used! I've only used it once & the stubborn blackheads & pores on my nose already look smaller. Plus me & my bro had a lot of fun with it watching eachothers face puff up from the bubbles. Will be buying more.

reviews.review_header: We have had some good laughs with it all while making our skin feel ...
reviews.review_text: I got this for me and my daughter. We have had some good laughs with it all while making our skin feel great.

It really really works. Just got the product and tried it today and all my dead skin, black heads, the oil and dirt from my face are gone. My pores already look amazing. I have combo skin depending on the season I'm oily or dry/flaky and it's perfect for it. I use the argan steam cream and they work great together. Will definitely recommend this brand and product. I will be purchasing again for sure.
Pretty funny - bubbles up quickly. I would recommend showering after. It's a pain to get off!

Love this bubble clay mask! It makes your face look and feel great after using. Has a tiny spatula took to help spread evenly. Definitely buying more soon, mine is almost gone but I've had it for 6+ months and use once a week!
It made my pores bigger and left a red rash on my nose and chin and I don't even have sensitive skin! Do a test first on a small area of your face before application.

didnt live up to the hype. Its ok. It does look really bright after washing it off. However it is a pain in the butt to wash it off. The only reason that will keep me away from using it. It is really fun tho but other then that there are way better stuff in the market

reviews.review_header: I use this once to twice a week to help ...
reviews.review_text: I use this once to twice a week to help with my oily skin and breakouts. It tickles when it starts bubbling but this works so well. I've noticed a huge difference in how my skin used to be before I used this and how it is now from only using it once or twice a week.
This is an amazing facial! Try it, no matter what your age.

reviews.review_header: This face mask is so fun and makes my skin very smooth
reviews.review_text: This face mask is so fun and makes my skin very smooth! I have pretty sensitive skin and this does not irritate my skin at all. I start by applying the mask and letting it sit for 10-15 minutes. Then I use warm water and scrub the bubbles or fizz of the mask back into my face. Then I rinse my face and apply moisturizer. I really recommend this for any sort of spa night. It's not the most glamorous looking mask, but it is a really great time!

reviews.review_header: Love it! Do yourself a favor and get this.
reviews.review_text: This stuff is crazy awesome. I love the way it bubbles up. I'm not a huge fan of how it tingles on your face because my skin is sensitive and it stings a little, but it doesn't cause any redness or irritation after it's washed off. In fact, my skin looks so fresh and bright afterwards. Definitely going to buy this again.

I bought this after seeing all the YouTube reviews. It looked fun and I wanted to try it. I have I usually have combination skin and usually oily in the t zone area, but lately I have been breaking out a lot on my cheeks. I use this mask 3-4x a week before bed for about a month and my skin looks phenomenal'' My pores are diminished and no breakouts!! Definitely worth buying. Only downside is you have to use a generous amount and it's a small container.
it is amazing it makes my skin tone one light shade.. it is amaxzzinnggg i will buy again!!!

reviews.review_header: so much fun! my husband and i were giggling at how ...
reviews.review_text: so much fun! my husband and i were giggling at how much it tickled and our skin felt so clean. he has psoriasis and it made a difference in his skin. mine is normal and we suffered no side effects

All of the instructions are in Korean, but I watched some YouTube videos for a good how to overview. Use the spatula included to apply, work quickly because it starts bubbling immediately, and after five minutes rub in. I left it on for another 10 minutes after rubbing it in. When I washed it off, my skin felt a bit rubbery, but by the next day it looked and felt amazing! I have used it several times already without making much of a dent in the amount of product left.

Not sure what all the hype is about. I tried it and although interesting I didn't see that it did a whole lot for my skin. It did really remove oil but with continued use I saw no difference in my pores.

A fun mask. Had to apply quickly since it fizzed up fast; But it was very interesting seeing it all bubble up. Warning though, when it gets on your hair its not how soap would be. When you try to take it out of your hair (when it accidentally gets on) it'll clump up. So make sure to use warm water to remove it from your hair and face. Since it sticks on your face too well when you begin washing. Other than that it gave a good result. It left my skin soft and subtle. The smell was good but I noticed a bit of a weird scent. Overall would buy again (when Im out of course)!

reviews.review_header: This mask is really fun! It bubbles up and makes your face look ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is really fun! It bubbles up and makes your face look really puffy. I don't think it does anything more for my skin than any other mask does, but I think the bubbles are a fun concept, and the packaging is really cute!

Super cool! It's lots of fun. Who would have thought that a face mask could be fun and actually work great? I get sweaty and sometimes dirty from working out and this stuff makes me feel pretty again. It makes my face feel smooth and look all one tone color.

I really enjoyed using this face mask! It made my skin feel tight and smooth, cleared my pores/blackheads, and easily took my makeup off. The only thing I didn't like about it was how hard it was to rinse off and my face felt like it was on fire for about 10 min after I rinsed it. I'm going to try it before I take a shower next time and see if it's easier to rinse off there instead. I don't recommend using before you go out if you have really sensitive skin, since it'll probably make your face really red for a while.

This product is so fun. I have been using it twice a week and enjoying the results. It mostly feels like a super cleanser. I pulls a lot of dirt out of my pores without drying my face out, like some clay masks can do. The bubbling happens quickly and can be a bit tickly, but it feels fun. I enjoy the smell of the product, too!
dude i put this on for the first time while I was high and then it started bubbling and I laughed soooo hard. it feels great on the skin

Initially, I purchased this mask for fun. The mask actually bubbles very well and I was surprised I even loved how it left my face feeling at the end. Be warned this can be ticklish, but it’s bareable and part of the fun. Definitely worth the ~$11 I paid. I posted a Snapchat and had three people ask me to send them the specific link to purchase it.

Works good, last a long time.keep the container closed as much and as tight as you can bc the carbonation seems to be activated by air.dont dip your finger in the tub, use the spatula bc bacteria.hide from your children and it'll last longer.

Best face mask if you want to clear our your pores in a longer, more fun way. Not suggested for sensitive skin people due to its bubbles constantly popping on your skin, but it's for a night time once a week type thing! very fun & when it's time to rinse off i would suggest going into the shower because it is clay & it's thick and slimy.

The seller did a great job because my package came in so cute! This is a fun clay mask that I would recommend for anyone and for any event. Make sure that you are quick when you apply this product to your face because the unused clay in the container does oxidize.
Looks horrifying on but is so amazing! I love this stuff. Don't cake it on. a thin layer works just as well. My face is so soft when I use it.
Tried this before from forever 21 and loved it. Super excited to find it cheaper. Can really tell a difference in my blackheads on my nose after using this product and it's super fun.
I don't know if this does anything beneficial to your skin other than leave it softer. It is fun watching it foam up though. I'd recommend having a spa night with a friend and having some laughs.

I got this as a saw a review for it on Facebook and thought it was cool how it bubbled. The first time I used it I could hear and feel the bubbles and it burned my face a little, not too bad but the results after were awesome. I have slight sensitive skin but it didn't irritate it at all. The end result was opened pores and rally smooth skin

reviews.review_header: This is the one of the best, if not the best mask I've ever used ...
reviews.review_text: This is the one of the best, if not the best mask I've ever used in my entire life! So good that this is my first review EVER on Amazon. The blackheads on my nose were significantly reduced after the first use & after a few uses, I literally have 95% reduced blackheads! Use before the shower so it's easy to remove & use toner & moisturizer afterwards & you will LOVE it.

reviews.review_header: Oh hey this is a fun gift for your girlfriends
reviews.review_text: Oh hey this is a fun gift for your girlfriends, or just bring it with you and have fun in girls weekend getaways. The clay smells nice, is smooth and easy to apply. As soon as it is place on your skin, it starts bubbling gently, creating the fun tingling sensation. I believe it helps clean your skin. My skin feels a bit smoother after use, but nothing magical.

I bought this product as a gift for my sister this Christmas. She liked how it made her skin feel smooth after she used it, and the bubbles made it amusing. The only complaint I would say is that the scrapper was hard to get out at first, but nothing worth docking it down to four stars.

reviews.review_header: Could be better could be worse
reviews.review_text: This was a fun facial mask. It does help a little bit, but not like advertised. Also, the application stick Is small so he prepared to make a mess on your hands

reviews.review_header: This stuff is a lot of fun to use and leaves your skin feeling so soft ...
reviews.review_text: This stuff is a lot of fun to use and leaves your skin feeling so soft and clean! The only downside is that there are no instructions in English so I had to look it up or go off of what I've seen people on Youtube do. Overall I really like it.

reviews.review_header: It was nice but I did look kind of like a monster ...
reviews.review_text: It was nice but I did look kind of like a monster after it foamed up. It foams up a lot. I only was able to use this once because I left it on the ground and my psycho dog who eats everything got to it. but that was my fault. If it helps, I would buy it again in the future so I can give a better review.

reviews.review_header: I like to use this and after I use my acne ...
reviews.review_text: I do not want to give this a 1 nor a 2 star because it does make my face feel smoother after using it so it helps me apply my makeup smoothly and flawlessly. I like to use this and after I use my acne wash to prevent any breakouts ^-^ my face did get red the first use but it's fine now.

reviews.review_header: This stuff is so cool! It goes on like a gooey clay and ...
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so cool! It goes on like a gooey clay and then it turns to foam. It feels all tingly as it turns into the foam. When I wash it off, my face feels soft and clean. This is my go-to product when I am looking for a good, full-face deep cleaning.

reviews.review_header: it would foam up like how it should
reviews.review_text: Okay so I have mixed feelings about this product. First of all when I first purchased it and began using it, it would foam up like how it should. However, now that I've had it for a couple of months it no longer foams up. I don't know if that has happened to anyone else but it is possible that it might happen. When it did foam up it was great, it cleaned and exfoliated my face really well. If I had a pimple that was not ready to pop, i would use my mask and it would gently bring it out pain free.

Had a girls day with my neices and we had so much fun "turning into clouds" lol! Only downside is the package is in Chinese so we had to youtube directions orherwise we definitely wouldnt have done it right. Dont even waste your time trying to get it off your face in the sink. Just get in the shower-trust me.

I belong to a group for dermatillomania and someone in that group recommended this. It feels kind of funny because you can feel the bubbles coming up on your face but it leaves your face feeling very refreshed and clean. I have terrible skin due to stress and such. Someone in reviewed mentioned the instructions not being in English but they must have fixed that because mine had a sticker on the box with English instructions. This is a good clay mask for the face!
Love this mask, and I love that you only keep it on for 5 minutes. Its an easy mask to do in the morning and it leaves my skin feeling amazing.

reviews.review_header: 3 stars because while it is fun to play around with and feels cool
reviews.review_text: 3 stars because while it is fun to play around with and feels cool, I haven't seen any true benefit to this product. I've used it a couple times, but now I just use it on my little cousin when she comes over. She loves to play with it, so I'm not mad

This product is so fun to use! All the bubbling sensation was ticklish and the product itself did the job. It was quite drying for me, which of course may depend on the skin type. Be careful on applying it close to the nostrils. I applied some and it went up my nose. The whole time I had it on, it was ticklish inside my nostrils.
I am loving this mask! It's fun and great!!!! Thank you so much!

reviews.review_header: burned while on face, I have sensitive skin BUT ...
reviews.review_text: burned while on face, I have sensitive skin BUT husband doesn't and it did the same to him, our faces are both red and severely dry.

When I purchased this, I was a bit apprehensive because from what I've seen and heard it was more of a novelty product, not very useful. Despite this, I was in a good mood one day and took a chance on it. A chance well worth it I'd say because I really enjoyed using it! It's a fun product that does leave my skin feeling soft and refreshed. It's not life changing by any means but I can't knock it down because it did what it was expected to do~
I love this mask. It is fun and makes your skin look great. The only weird thing about this mask is that as is bubbles up it feels like it is running down your face even though it is not.

Super fun!!! I have very sensitive skin but this didn't bother it at all AND I could feel and see a difference just after one use. My skin was glowing and my pores were smaller. And did I mention FUN!!!

reviews.review_header: Helped my cyst and my overall blemishes
reviews.review_text: I love this product I have a cyst on my upper right cheek bone and went to a Dermotologist she said she wouldn't drain it and I needed to goto a plastic surgeon I used this mask everyday and I saw a saficiant decrease in its size I was prescribed a topical ointment to put on the cyst it didn't do much this face mask has improved not only my cyst but my blemishes on my face all together I would recommend this to anyone

reviews.review_header: A really fun way to do your own facial
reviews.review_text: A really fun way to do your own facial. The bubbly foaming action starts almost immediately and is a very unique sensation. The mask itself is very cooling on the skin. I usually do use it in two phases: I apply the mask in a thin but full layer on my face using the small spoon (avoiding the eye area, because the foam spreads a little). Then after about 5 minutes, I rub the foam into my skin for a second pass, and wash it off completely after a minute or two. Washing the mask off can be a small chore, so I tend to hop into the shower to wash it off, rather than bend over my sink for a few minutes of scrubbing.

reviews.review_header: Left my skin rough and angry
reviews.review_text: I like how it felt going on, and I think I noticed a difference. However, I used it twice in three days (took a day off) and my cheeks were left rough, angry and stinging. It took weeks for my skin to recover. It may work for your skin, but it didn't work for mine.

reviews.review_header: Good for a laugh or a sleep over/beauty party, but not for a real skin remedy
reviews.review_text: I think this product is either too mild for my needs or that it is more of a novelty- to see ones face get bubbly and deformed while wearing the mask. It tingles and it feels cool on my face. The bubbling up seems to be more for other's reactions to me using this clay mask than for lifting out impurities from my skin. It is a mild mask even though it has a menthol-like sensation. The product is a grey clay mask that bubbles up once it is applied on the skin. It feels fresh and tingly on the skin... the clay should draw out impurities from the skin. But I have found that it does not really dry up on the skin. The instructions are in another language, so my different occasions of using this mask I have tried different things such as leaving it on for different amounts of time. It just does not dry hard. I have also tried smoothing the mask back into my face after it had bubbled up- that does not seem to make a difference in performance. Removal of the Elizavecca Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay mask takes some work. I find it easiest to remove it while showering- lots of water and rubbing. Conclusion: I have used it a few times and shared the product with friends... along with taking photos to share the puffy face. After using the product my skin is left feeling velvety soft, it is nice, but I do not think there is any other benefit... no pore tightening, no deep cleansing of pores or drawing out impurities, no reducing the size of my pimples, no exfoliation, no hydration.

reviews.review_header: It does a good job making my face feel soft after use but ...
reviews.review_text: As soon as I opened my bottle it started to bubble. It bubbles a lot quicker than I expected. Didn't even get half my face before it started to bubble. It does a good job making my face feel soft after use but the quickly bubbling bothers me. Besides that good product.
Feels very clean after, but the carbonation made my face itch super bad so I had to wash it off early.

reviews.review_header: I really wanted to love this! However
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this! However, it irritated my skin. The second i put it on my face it started to itch, like a lot! I could only tolerate it for about 3 minutes. I will say that my face felt SUPER soft after i washed off the equivalent of a wool sweater off my face. I'm so jealous that everyone else doesn't have my dumb skin.

I picked up the “Elizavecca Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask” after seeing so many video’s on YouTube about it. I really didn’t know what to except. If it was really worth the money or just Hyped up. For me it was really a great fascial mask. It left my face feeling smooth, clean and not overly tight. And the bubbles were a Plus. It was fun and different. I would repurchase this mask once it’s gone.

Overall a great and fun product. Has a refreshing subtle lemon sent and the consistency is pleasing to apply. As far as the bubble part it almost triples in thickness through the bubbles expanding which is fun the watch. I feels a little tingly during the process as well. I have found that once the bubbles have expanded as much as possible, you are able to rub it back in the skin and they still expand. As for the results from the mask, I didn't notice any huge improvements but my face did feel nice and clean.

reviews.review_header: whenever my skin is SUPER oily (more than normal and I have pretty oily ...
reviews.review_text: First off this mask only takes 5 minutes which is a blessing. Second off, whenever my skin is SUPER oily (more than normal and I have pretty oily skin as is) one quick 5 minute session with this mask and the oil is all under control. I love it.
This stuff is amazing!!! It kinda tickles my nose if I put it between my nose and mouth but that's the only downside. I notice a difference after one use. My skins so much softer!

reviews.review_header: It feels great and it is fun on top of everything else
reviews.review_text: This stuff is incredible. It feels great and it is fun on top of everything else!

This clay mask is great. The bubbles are very tingling and the mask has a cooling sensation. You might need to bring your elbow grease to remove it, however, but it works great. It left the skin feeling cool, tight, and smooth.
I bought this after seeing pictures on Instagram. Thought it would just be fun to use... but it actually works. Unclogs pores very well. Would be five starts BUT it is a pain to wash off.

I tried this with my sister. We both found it itchy and tickly while it was on our faces and couldn't wait to get it off. It doesn't really help your skin; it's more of a novelty. I thought it would be kind of fun but it was just annoying.

reviews.review_header: reduced puffiness under eyes, removed oil and left skin smooth
reviews.review_text: It removed about 90% oil. It left face very smooth and reduced puffiness under the eyes. Its very easy to use, don't need to use too much. it smells like laundry detergent. not terrible

It had a weird consistency going on, almost slimy like it would drip off. But once I got used to that it was fine. A little went a long way too. After I rinsed it off my skin was so smooth & soft. Felt like I’d had a facial.
The bubbling is cool. It will definitely tickle before the 15 minutes or so is up. Making you want to get rid of it. But i like it, my face feels clean after.

reviews.review_header: I tried this mask after reading the amazing reviews right here on Amazon
reviews.review_text: I tried this mask after reading the amazing reviews right here on Amazon. I've used this mask 3 times now, and each time it's left my skin soft smooth and much brighter. I have found the next day that pimples which were taking forever to surface, surface right away and go away much quicker. This mask is good for anyone with any type of skin. It's fun and it works!
Such a fun mask! Don't put too much near your nose or the mask will turn against you and try to smother you with bubbles.

reviews.review_header: Made my skin feel nice and smooth afterwards
reviews.review_text: Made my skin feel nice and smooth afterwards, also felt as though it reduced the size of my acne and made the dullness in my skin go away. It was kind of itchy when the bubbles were in full effect though. Looked ridiculous and it scared my baby haha

Fun to use made my face super soft but does not store well after 3 weeks it was watery and ruined I made sure to never use my hands to apply and always kept it in a cool dry place and still got ruined
It itches soooo much.

reviews.review_header: Brilliant! I love this mask so much
reviews.review_text: Brilliant! I love this mask so much. It's easy to apply and comes with a tiny spatula for application. Apply quickly as product begins to bubble once oxygenated. Produces a tingly feeling while on as the product continues to bubble. Easy to wash off and leaves face soft and bright.

So this mask felt pretty cool initially, but unfortunately I am very allergic to it. My skin was a little irritated after, but early the next morning I woke up with hives. Sadly I won't be able to use it again, but I liked the idea of it!

reviews.review_header: This product is great. Leaves your face feeling very clean
reviews.review_text: This product is great. Leaves your face feeling very clean. The bubbling effect is pretty awesome as well. You don't need as much as you think.

reviews.review_header: It bubbles and foams great. Really really fun and shrunk some of my ...
reviews.review_text: It bubbles and foams great. Really really fun and shrunk some of my pores. I dont recommend it on dry skin though because it caused me to break out a little on my cheeks. However, on my nose where i had a LOT of blackheads, they disappeared. Amazing.

reviews.review_header: This was a very fun mask. It bubbles
reviews.review_text: This was a very fun mask. It bubbles... a lot. You really don't need much. I know I'm not the first to say it, but it is very true. The first time I applied too much. I wiped the first layer of bubbles off and the layer underneath bubbled all over again. It did make my skin feel smoother and cleaner. No super crazy transformation, but the carbonation makes it a unique experience. All I can say is this would be a blast for a spa night with friends, but also enjoyable alone as a treat.
This was so fun to use and see my family's reaction hahaha

This is just fun to use with your friends. We got a good laugh at it bubbling up on our faces. It made my skin feel pretty nice too. After you apply if you need more be sure to clean off the spatula before dipping back into the jar. It causes the rest to bubble up on you.

I've only used it twice so far so I can't really say whether it truly works to get rid of black heads or blemishes or not, but it is really fun to watch and feel bubble up on your face. It is drying so be sure to moisturize after. Just be sure to reseal the jar, because it will start to bubble up too.
