reviews.review_header: i enjoy a thorough clean feeling and it really gets into ...
reviews.review_text: i thought this was just a gimmick but it does really work! i enjoy a thorough clean feeling and it really gets into pores.

Love love love ! Great amazing product, its a refreshing mask you can feel. I did facials on my entire family because of how fun and eady this product is to use. Comes with small paddle/spatula to spread the mask on face. Leavr on for 5min, rub in then was. Turns soapy, easy to wash off . Results are instant!
Foaming is so fun!!!! Face broke out about a week later but then was sooooo fresh and clean. It really pulled the impurities out!

This is by far one of the best masks I have ever used. The bubbling let's you know it's working. Leaves your skin fresh and soft. Helps my daughter with her blemishes, reduces redness and helps them disappear faster. We use it as part of our regular skin regime.

reviews.review_header: I did a review on my YouTube channel it was ...
reviews.review_text: I did a review on my YouTube channel it was 😒.....it was jus a hyped up product it doesn't do much.
It makes my face feel firm and clean. I like the bubbling. It is a little difficult to remove so I would recommend to use this before a shower to remove it. I really liked it though.

i have been using it for a long time now. i has been good. skin is super smooth after every wash. however now my skin has develop some sort of issue (not sure if related to the product or not). my face gets really really red. i have stop using it just in case, and I'm going to the doc to check if its related or not.

reviews.review_header: Super fun to watch this mask grow
reviews.review_text: Super fun to watch this mask grow. Also fun to sneak up and scare the hubby with it on my face. It will make you look like a troll while it's on. But once I rinsed it off, my skin was left feeling really nice. I try to do this mask at least once a week.

reviews.review_header: but it was a lot of fun to use
reviews.review_text: No idea if it changed my skin, but it was a lot of fun to use. Feels like you rubbed poprocks on your face :)
This mask is so fun! Easy to apply, but it does start bubbling up right away so put it on quickly. It made my whole family laugh.

I truly love this product. I am on my second jar. It's a little strange to put on and really tickles as it bubbles, but after you rub it in and wash it off, your skin looks and feels brand new. So soft, clean and supple. If you want a great complexion and a fun mask to use - buy this.

reviews.review_header: Makes your face feel great! This jar tends to last me a good ...
reviews.review_text: Makes your face feel great! This jar tends to last me a good 7 months or so, and it'll bubble up every time. It makes your skin feel fresh and tight.

Me and my sister used this product last night. We had so much fun with it and we could not stop laughing. It bubbles up fast so make sure you hurry up and apply it to your face. I used a cloth to help take off the product just becuase it does kind of stick to your face. If anyone has recomindations when taking it off then please comment on this. Other than that it left my skin feeling so soft and bright. Im going to continue to use this and see the long term effects.

reviews.review_header: This product is rather innovative and it is fun to put the product on your face and feels ...
reviews.review_text: This product is rather innovative and it is fun to put the product on your face and feels all of the bubble develop. However, a day or two after I put it on, my face started to break out.

So fun! This mask is easy to apply and very entertaining when it foams up! You can also feel it working. My skin feels very moisturizer when I wash it off. So much so, I usually don't moisturizer afterwards.

reviews.review_header: The bubbles tingle and itch a little as they are getting bigger but its actually fun, especially if you do the mask with someone ...
reviews.review_text: Makes your skin baby soft! The bubbles tingle and itch a little as they are getting bigger but its actually fun, especially if you do the mask with someone else at the same time.

This mask is a lot of fun! It's so neat to see and feel the mask bubble up! Although be careful on placement, it took me a while to realize how far to place it from my eyes. It would always foam up and get into my eye lashes. I would've given it 4.5, but I only gave it 4 out of 5 because of how difficult it is to get off. I have to practically scrub my face with a washcloth to get it off, and it soaps up as well, so sometimes you can get bubbles in your nose or mouth when trying to rinse off. However, my face always feels amazing after and looks so bright and refreshed, so it's totally worth it.

reviews.review_header: Great product, took awhile to get here.
reviews.review_text: Took awhile to receive but when I finally got the product it was pretty fun! Made my husband try it too! It didn't burn or irratiate my face and I have VERY sensitive skin! Great product!

reviews.review_header: Don't get the hype. The bubbling sensation irritates my ...
reviews.review_text: Don't get the hype. The bubbling sensation irritates my skin to the point of burning and I don't see any real difference after use.
Like the carbonated part, its fun, but didn't see drastic changes in my skin.... Dunno if its worth the hype?

reviews.review_header: I thought this would be fun (because of the bubbles) and clay properties but it ...

I thought the product was good and something worth trying with family and friends however I did NOT care for the lid that's "supposed" to close the mask. I tried several times to close the lid and kept getting airbubbles making it hard to do so which kept making the mask foam up. Looks like I'm going to have to use the mask everyday so the product doesn't go bad which is an inconvenience on a busy schedule. Other then that the mask makes my face very soft and with a glow.

reviews.review_header: This was the most fun face make I've used in a long time

Absolutely wonderful mask. Kinda weird at first because it seems to foam up and creates a tingling sensation that is a little odd at first. It made my face itch! But once I took it off, my skin felt incredibly smooth.

reviews.review_header: Only complaint and it's minor when it bubbles it starts to feel like I have an itchy nose
reviews.review_text: Works well and ffn to use. Only complaint and it's minor when it bubbles it starts to feel like I have an itchy nose. Nothing wrong with the product just that I really want to itch my face while trying to wait out the 5, 10 mins this is on.

Great product for having a fun facial. Feels great, makes skin feel clean after using. Just like any other clay mask, it takes some effort to remove. I didn't notice a wow factor result, but it was definitely fun to use!
Not sure if I did something wrong or it’s the quality of the product but this mask didnt work at all

reviews.review_header: It's not easy to apply and it's hard to wash off
reviews.review_text: It's not easy to apply and it's hard to wash off. The clay mask is like thick soap on my face. I lather to wash it off but I get a bunch of bubbles and it's annoying when it gets in your nose.
Works okay, very hard to remove and stings in your eye. It’s fun but doesn’t do much. Puffs up a lot so don’t use too much!!
I really enjoy this product, but it burned slightly and definitely caused my face to dry out. I wouldn't recommend using frequently.

reviews.review_header: It felt like a growing fuzzy storm cloud on my face
reviews.review_text: It felt like a growing fuzzy storm cloud on my face ⛈ I would say to put this on before you shower- it takes quite a bit of rinsing to get off your face but it does leave you skin so soft!
It feels great on the skin & the bubbles feel cool. It's refreshing & easy to clean off the skin. It also doesn't leave a weird residue on your skin like some other masks do.

I love this product. I have combination skin and have tried many things and just haven't been able to find the right product until I bought this. Tried it with my daughter and had lots of fun! It made a difference with first use with smaller pores and smoother skin. I will continue to use this product!

reviews.review_header: This product is one of my favorite masks ever

One thing that is not to forget is when it is done bubbling up, you have to crush the bubble then massage the product on your face. I already lost the spoon that came with this.

reviews.review_header: Fun for men, women and children
reviews.review_text: Don't know if my pores are cleaner, but it's fun to use and my skin is softer. It would be fun for teenage girls pajama party. Do they still have those parties?

reviews.review_header: not great use for acne clear up. But does help clean and brighten face.
reviews.review_text: I love the bubble part, as far as clearing up acne or spots , I didn't see any improvement in that , however I did see a difference in the silky and brightening of my face and skin.
It is a great product, makes easier to clean blackheads, creates a lot of foam, but under the foam you can feel a layer of the mask. 100% better than the black masks everyone is selling right now.

So much fun to use. Downfall is all the instructions are not in English but there are plenty of YouTube videos that show how to use it. It did come with a few samples of other products as well when I ordered it. But bubbles up LARGE on face and leaves skin feeling so clean.

reviews.review_header: other than being unique or cool I don't think it does

The effervescent bubbles do tickle a little but you can really feel them working on your pores. After just one try, in five minutes, my skin was smoother than it's ever been in the winter!
Me and my cousin did this face mask together. It bubbled so much, it made my face look super fat, it was funny! It also made my face feel really clean amd rejuvenated.

reviews.review_header: I love this mask because it makes my skin feel great
reviews.review_text: I love this mask because it makes my skin feel great. It bubbles up and tickles a bunch lol but it definitely cleans my pores and works as a makeup remover. It is a fun mask and I definitely recommend

This stuff is really cool. It made my skin soft, but also tightened it (I'm 32, and will take any skin tightness I can get!) It does a pretty good job of cleaning out pores, too. I would get it again.

Right now I love this stuff I just got and my skin is really sensitive didn't bother my skin and left it feeling clean plus it's really fun Cons right now it's foaming up in the container I just got it today so by morning if it survives and doesn't leak out everywhere I'll be keeping it if not and it in fact gets everywhere I won't be re ordering it because it's not worth $10 for a one time use
This is one of my go to face masks to give to my friends. They all love it and It’s just a fun face mask
Not only does this mask make my skin feel amazing, I laugh the entire time it is on. It does tickle quite a bit!
You might be wondering if it bubbles. It does. It also happens to leave your skin feeling smooth and clean, so that's a plus.

reviews.review_header: Just as fun as you would imagine.
reviews.review_text: SUPER FUN! Kinda messy, but definitely a fun experience. I recommend doing it with someone so you can laugh at each other. Leaves your skin smooth and soft, I love it.

reviews.review_text: This mask is literally "what you see is what you get" typw od product. It works amazingly just as you see on youtube. My face feels so nice, soft and clean after i use it everytime!

I bought this as a gift for my friend and she says it works! After it bubbles, make sure to rub it on your face to get the full effect. She said she noticed a difference with redness on her cheeks.

[...] This was an awesome & fun product to try out. I actually had a slight rash but i really wanted to try this product so i did and it didn't irritate my rash, personally. This stuff is so funny to use! It’s a nice product but the best part is the laughing at each other’s rediculous faces! Great for couples who like to be straight up dorks together. Or by yourself. Made my skin feel soft and clean but man I’m telling you GET IT FIR THE LAUGHS!
Don't waste your time. This wasn't effective. Silly gimmick.

reviews.review_header: Good clean but be aware of scent
reviews.review_text: I like the mask, hate the scent. It has a strong cologne scent that stayed on my skin so I'm going to have to pass this on to a friend.

One thing I did like was that my T-Zone was less oily the following day, I guess I'll have to give this a little more time and see if I see any improvements.

reviews.review_header: the bubbles aren't for me, but it does clean very well!

Warning, if you're ticklish... this might not be the best clay mask for you because once the bubbles start to activate you're gonna want to scratch your face.

Great mask, i don’t really know what it’s supposed to do for my skin but it feels great and is really fun! instructions were not english! I don’t like the wash off factor it is thick and messy but hey it is a clay mask so i didn’t expect anything different!

The only bad thing I can say about it is that once the 10 minutes have ended & your face is full of bubbles, it is a hassle to rinse off.

It was really fun at first. It smells really good and it tickled my face but sadly it stunf afterwards and idk if it's Cuz I have sensitive skin or what. It also didn't really clear my skin up. My skin felt a little softer I guess but it was more of the fun of putting it on

I got this for my girlfriend. She left our bedroom Looking normal, came back looking like mold had grown on her face. After she washed it off her skin was so smooth and felt nice. At times she has sensitive skin, but so far so good. No break outs. Other reviews made her hesitsnt but she was like "hey.. I wanna be a grey bubble monster."

Such a fun mask! The novelty of this doesn't wear off (for me at least). It does make my skin feel soft and smooth right after use. I love the light scent, as well. Have added this to my weekly skin care routine!
Definitely one of my favorite go to face masks when I don’t have a lot of time my skin feels so clean after use and you’ll definitely have a good laugh when you see your face full of bubbles 😅

Love how it bubbles. But unfortunately after using it for a few weeks. I have broken out all over my face. Don't think it's a reflection on the product.my skin just doesn't like it. But definitely a fun mask to use.

reviews.review_header: This must be the most fun face mask I own - it looks ridiculous when ...

Love this product! I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin and I can use this with no reaction. Leaves my skin feeling smooth and clean! The bubbling action makes it fun.

reviews.review_header: its just a fun thing to do
reviews.review_text: dont put it around ur nose it tickles. i dont think this does much for my skin. its just a fun thing to do.

reviews.review_header: Not Like Your Typical Face Mask!
reviews.review_text: I love to try different beauty products, especially face masks. I bought this after my friend introduced it to me. It is AMAZING! It feels like no other mask I've ever tried before! I love how you can feel it working, cleaning deep into my pores. You do have to apply this mask quickly, because it is fast-acting.

reviews.review_header: This stuff is fun to use and makes your face feel really clean

reviews.review_header: The mask is fun to put on
reviews.review_text: The mask is fun to put on. The only thing is that it is hard to take off. I've come to put it on right before taking a shower so that it doesn't make a mess when I take it off. Skin is smooth after the mask is off. The plus side is that it is fun to put on.
It's fun EVERY TIME. I keep making my friends try it with me which is great girl time. It does make my skin feel soft after, but it's more about the experience.

Very fun mask that always leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth, and also provides loads of entertainment. I would recommend putting it on before a shower because it does take quite a bit of washing to get it off. Also do not exfoliate before the mask, it burns a little (my skin is a little on the sensitive side).

reviews.review_header: This product also made my face itch like crazy the entire minute that you are suppose to ...

Don't recommend for sensitive skin. I'll stick to face washes/masks that don't pink my face. Nonetheless the experience of seeing the mask expand was fun ... once. At least I can check it off my "must try" list

Really pulls blackheads to the surface! About once a week my daughter and I will wash or faces and use this mask. It only has to be on for a couple of minutes, then as soon as we wash it off we look in the mirror and everything has come to the surface! We'll both be using this product from now on.

reviews.review_header: Very fun mask! It's a messy mask so I would ...

If I could give this product 10 stars, I would. This was the most entertaining face mask I have ever done. I have shown my family the mask and now all of them are waning their own jar. Makes your skin feel great, silky smooth. I have sensitive skin and didn't react to the mask, so that was awesome. Definitely buying again when I run out, which will probably be soon :)

My new favorite clay mask!! Not only because it fizzles but it does leave your skin feeling clean and oh so smooth~~ The instructions are in korean so let me tell you wsup! - First wash your face nice and clean and pat dry - Second use the applicator to mix the clay mask around a bit - Third Take a generous glob and smear it on your cheeks, chin, forehead, and nose (don't touch the mask in the container with your fingers! it'll cause a reaction and start bubbling) - Fourth Use your fingers or applicator (I like to use my fingers) and evenly distribute the clay mask all over your face and avoid getting into your eyes and near your mouth - Fifth After waiting about 5-10 minutes, pop them fizzing bubbles with your fingers by rubbing it all over your face again - Six Let it sit again for about 5 minutes. - Seventh Wash it off~ It's a little hard to wash it off so you're going to do a bit if rubbing. Note that this mask suds up like soap. - Lastly pat dry That's it! I do this mask about 1 - 2x a week (: Love it!
I love this mask, it makes your face feel clean and I'm surprised that this isn't more popular.

reviews.review_header: If you are looking for a mask that will specifically ...
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a mask that will specifically target blackheads and pull them out, this is not the product for you! However, it did make my skin tighter afterwards and closed my pores slightly. In my opinion, this is half gimmick and half worth your money!

This product is my favorite face mask! My husband bought this for me as a Christmas present since I am big on beauty products. I love the tingly sensation and my husband gets a kick over how goofy I look when it foams. I am currently purchasing more since I've already gone through the entire container.

Washing off was a bit of a pain because of the consistency, but my skin felt so good afterwards and the large pores across my nose and cheeks looked clearer than I think they ever have!

I love this stuff, is crazy weird feeling when it starts bubbling but works really good

I do wish the instructions came with an English translation so I didn't have to google them every time (I can never remember how long to leave on the mask!) Overall, this is a fun way to clean your face, but I won't be buying again.

reviews.review_header: Maybe other people will like that sensation

reviews.review_header: I use this about 2 times a week and my ...

It can be a bit of a pain to wash off, but that's really the only downside.

reviews.review_header: Love it. It tickles a bit when it bubbles

Tickles in a good way. Strong smell, but in a good way. Crazy texture. Bubbles tickle but your skin feels so clean and soft afterward. Such a cool mask! Love the tingly sensation you get from the bubbles! Leaves skin soft and supple...and clean!
My daughter and I love doing this mask just for the pure humor this mask brings! Other than that it is a really nice mask, leaves the skin nice and smooth.

This is hands down the best stuff I've used in a LONG, LONG time. I have pretty good skin -- it tends to get flaky because it's dry. I do breakout -- but it's rare. My biggest problem is that I tend to get blackheads on my very oily nose. I've used so many things that claim to get rid of blackheads -- but aside from using gelatin (and using the pinterest trick where this forms sort of like a pore strip), *nothing* would work. Then...I found this stuff. It's a dream come true. My nose is blackhead free and feels as smooth as a baby's bottom. You use a scoop to apply this stuff to your face. It goes on like a normal clay mask. After about five minutes, this stuff starts to foam up. It's super tingly and really feels like it is penetrating my skin. After a little while, massage this stuff into your skin. Then wash it off. I swear by this stuff now. Thanks to this, my nose no longer looks like a polka dot of blackheads!

reviews.review_header: It makes my face feel wonderful.
reviews.review_text: I cant read anything on the outside of the container, but I did read the reviews before I bought it. It makes my face feel wonderful.

I bought this mask to help me with bumps underneath my forehead. I've used it 3 times so far but definitely saw the results,bumps became smaller and some disappeared. I used it on areas where congested re forehead,nose,chin. It did a great job on me clearing blackheads on my nose. It didn't leave uncomfortable feeling but I used toner and moisturizer after. I need to continue using it before hopefully I see more results.
Feels amazing and bubbles up so much! It feels nice because it almost feels like it's getting in your pores and lifting everything up!

I love this mask! It feels really cool as it starts to bubble and makes your skin feel all tingly. After washing it off, my skin felt very fresh and soft and my pores seemed smaller. Be careful about putting any under your nose though because it will tickle as it starts bubbling!

This product is amazing! I have oily, acne prone skin and I tend to get visibly clogged pores in some spots on my face. Once a week, after exfoliating, I put this stuff on. It smells light and floral, and the packaging is amazing. I just slather a cherry-sized amount all over my face (quickly, or it will start to foam!) and wait for it to expand. It's really funny once it expands, and it feels great. After it has expanded, I add some water and massage it onto my face. Finally, I rinse. It makes every clogged pore disappear, brightens my skin, and helps with acne. I will continue purchasing-plus, it came with a few sample packets of other products to try!

reviews.review_header: I Love it. But I didn't expect to.
reviews.review_text: Take a risk. Normally I make my own clay and charcoal masks at home in a little mixing bowl for kitchen spices, but one I have specifically designated for masks. Anyway, it's a hassle doing it. The powder gets everywhere, it only keeps for so long, getting all that caked on clay off your face feels like it's doing more damage than good. To me, this mask is the next generation of clay masks. It not only cleans deeper, but it's also easier to get off than the standard clay packs and it has a nice warming feel on the face. Caolin also makes a nice one, but this review isn't about that. Don't be thrown off by the packaging, if you aren't feeling it - I'm normally a more elegant packaging girl myself - but because this stuff really does work, I'm keeping it. Great for a deep clean after a summer day, fishing on the lake or anytime you know you're going to be a greaseball. It lifts it all off and leaves you feeling real fresh!

reviews.review_header: Great pore-cleansing mask and SO MUCH FUN!
reviews.review_text: This is the most fun I've ever had cleaning my face. My fifteen year-old daughter heard about it (we're both recent converts to the wonders of Korean skin routines) and we decided to try it, if only to be able to say we owned a facial product called "Milky Piggy". We usually use clay masks to purify and de-oil our skin. This works better and you get a good laugh to boot. It comes with a little spatula. Use it. If you stick your fingers in this stuff, it starts the foaming process in the jar, which is not what you want. Scoop some out, spread it all over your face and feel the sparkly party begin. Wait for 8 minutes and try not to scratch or sneeze (it tickles!). Your face will feel like it has ginger ale bubbles all over it. Pretty soon you will have a smooth, thick layer of foam on your face that makes your features look lumpy and misshapen. While you're waiting for the 8 minutes to end, go leap out at someone and scare the pants off them. I recommend washing this off in the shower. Especially if you're fifteen and splashy at the sink. It's gray and foamy and it doesn't just wipe off. You put a little water on your face and massage the mask into a creamy consistency and then gently wipe with fingers and more water until it's gone. It may take a bit, so be patient. Your face will be soft and clean and all the crud in your pores will be under siege. Plus you just had the most fun at-home facial ever!

reviews.review_text: This stuff is pretty incredible! First let me start with the positives: it's easy to apply, it has a mellow scent, it's easy to wash off, and it WORKS! It took out stubborn blackheads on my nose and chin. (Without over drying). You can literally feel it working as it bubbles... which leads me to the only negative about this product is that it itches! It's recommended to leave it on for 5 minutes which is kind of difficult since you want to scratch so badly the entire time. However, even with the itchiness I would still give this a solid 5 stars. Overall we are very happy with this product and would definetet buy it again!

This stuff is AMAZING! Wow, the way it feels on your face is so cool! Like millions of tiny little bubble popping all over your face, then when you rub it in it becomes this amazingly thick clay mask. Takes a minute to get it washed off, but the after feeling is so nice! Defiantly a great buy!!
I bought this not knowing if I'd like it or not and the first time I used it I fell in love. You can literally feel this mask cleaning out your pores. It's amazing and would definitely recommend!!!
This stuff tickles so much! However, your face feel super moisturized and clean afterwards. I highly recommend this mask to anyone. Works on all skin types.
great mask bubbles are rlly cool i think it helps idk but i have pretty bad skin and i think this mask helped

Love this!! I suffer from oily skin and now my face feels so clean and tight.It feels weird with the tingling sensation and hard to not scratch but it's over with in about 5 minutes. I'm so glad I purchased this item.

reviews.review_header: Glad Amazon has the instructions in English on the product ...
reviews.review_text: Had to try this after watching people try it on YouTube. Glad Amazon has the instructions in English on the product page, as there are no English instructions with the product. Definitely a fun mask, tickles a little as it bubbles on your face.
This was a shot in the dark purchase. To my surprise it works very well. My pores look smaller and blackheads are almost gone after four used. Will purchase again.
this is fun to use, but I cant say it has made any great improvement for my skin and the smell isn't pleasant

There is nothing too exciting about this mask. I have tried all kinds and this one for sure is not my favorite. I purchased after those dang ads on Facebook. I mean it feels good and it is fun, but I don't see any great benefits from it! But it is a fun time!
It's fun to use and it does make my face softer. I'm sure I'll notice further improvement with continued use.

My wife really liked this, and she say really helps, the only thing people need to take care is to dont touch the product in the container if you already touch your face. A plus is that is pretty fun to use.

reviews.review_header: This is literally the most awesome face mask I've ever used
reviews.review_text: This is literally the most awesome face mask I've ever used! Idk about the results yet cause I'm still wearing it but 1. Shipping was super quick and 2.its super light weight it smells amazing and there are little popping air bubbles all over my face it's incredible!

reviews.review_header: You know how you get an annoying itch on your nose while you’re at the dentist
reviews.review_text: You know how you get an annoying itch on your nose while you’re at the dentist? That is how the tingling feels like when your face starts to bubble when using this product. Other than that, it works great! Skin feels clean, smooth and soft after rinsing. I usually only keep it on for about 2 minutes max because I can’t stand the tingling.

reviews.review_header: but it's fun to use at least lol
reviews.review_text: This doesn't seem to have made a huge difference with my skin, but it's fun to use at least lol.

I was so excited to get this mask. My fiancé and I both tried it and both us felt the urge to scratch because the bubbles made our faces so itchy. The only negative about this mask is that it takes quite a while to rinse off. Like almost 7-10 minutes. Otherwise, my skin felt great afterwards.

reviews.review_header: when my skin is feeling dry and dull. It tickles and it freaks my dog out ...
reviews.review_text: Makes you face feel so refreshed and soft afterwards. I do it once every 2 weeks, when my skin is feeling dry and dull. It tickles and it freaks my dog out because by the end of the 5 mins its foamed up so much you don't even look like the same person. The one jar will probably last me a year.
One of my favorite masks! The bubbling effect is so cool, and my skin always feels nice and clean after use!
Love it. Gives an odd sensation but great clean. Pro tip. Use a little. Don't slather this all over. Otherwise you will be scrubbing all night.

It tickles a little around the nose but it is so worth it. I recommend this item to anyone looking for a good face mask. For the price I would say "Go for it!"

The foam really increases the longer you leave it on. After washing it off my face felt smooth and clean with no irritation at all!

reviews.review_header: This mask was fun to put on my face and it did bubble ...

I think this mask is more fun than anything. It does not come with instructions and all packaging other than the title is in, what I'm guessing is Korean. It left my face soft and smoothe and is definitely more fun to use with friends. Word of advice: every time you insert the spatula back into the tub and it touches the mask, it activates the mask so, scoop out as much as you need in one swoop if you can to avoid activating some of the rest of the mask.
I've only used it once so far but I really like this mask. I saw an online video for it and had to try it. It's bubble up really nicely and makes my skin feel really soft and clean after.

reviews.review_header: 10/10 recommend!! I haven’t been this excited about a ...

I have so many masks and face washes and this is by far the best mask i have ever used, its fun and makes your face super soft, skin actually looks brighter and better immediately after use. My favorite way to use it, is to apply mask and wait about 10 min, then once the mask is all bubbly rub it in again and massage my face, and then leave that again
not crazy about it. Everything is in another language, hard to read the ingredients. It does bubble up.
Everyone will be joining the party! My daughter's love this mask! We just got two more for birthday gifts for their friends. Makes a great gift! Perfect for sleepovers!

Super cool, made for fun Snapchat pics. Worked well, it drew out impurities because the next day I woke up with two new blemishes. Which, btw people, if you use a charcoal/clay product and nothing happens - it isn't the one for you. Now, a reaction is different, but a pimple or two means it's doing its job. It doesn't come with an applicator, so pick up some disposable spatulas to apply so you don't contaminate your product.
LOVE THIS MASK, not only is it fun to use. But it leaves my skin feeling clean but not dry like some other masks do.

reviews.review_header: I love the feeling when it bubbles up because it's as ...

reviews.review_header: Other than the fact that it bubbles up on your ...
reviews.review_text: Other than the fact that it bubbles up on your face within a minute, I haven't really found this product to be beneficial to my skin. However, I have acne prone skin and am pregnant right now searching for a product that works. It didn't work for me, but everyone's skin is different.
I love it so much. I

A fun mask to try. It doesn't look great in the jar, somewhat viscous looking but it feels and smells nice. Usually done before a shower since it takes a lot of rinsing to take off. Haven't notice a lot of clearing out of the pores, but my skin feels really nice afterwards.

After one use, my skin is baby-soft and my pores are MUCH less noticeable. The foaming effect didn't itch for me, it just tingled pleasantly. Will definitely buy more when it runs out (which will take a while, a little goes a very long way). Be careful not to put it too close to your nose or mouth though, I almost inhaled some bubbles.

reviews.review_header: but wow do I love it makes my skin feel

It didn't break me out, so that's a plus. I will update if this improves the quality of my skin or does something negatively, which I doubt.
It’s amazing! I have sensitive, combination skin and this worked like a charm! Got all the crud out, while leaving my skin soft and hydrated. Will keep buying!

reviews.review_header: VERY thick when trying to wash off
reviews.review_text: It feels great, but it is very difficult to remove! Best to be in the shower where you can have water constantly washing it off your face. It does not harden, but it's very thick and not easy to wash off without a washcloth and tons of water.

reviews.review_header: it worked wonderfully. I don’t know if my mask had a ...

The whole mask did not foam up like promised and it felt really bad on my skin. I’m not angry with it because it was a 10.00 mask but proceed with caution.

So much fun to apply. The bubbling clay is so unique that I actually apply the mask regularly as a fun activity. It's a little difficult to wash off so use a thin cotton cloth if possible. I also experienced slight burning in some areas like my cheeks during the bubbling but I followed the mask with deeply moisturizing face lotion, and have not experienced any negative consequences.

reviews.review_header: Use at your own risk if you have sensitive skin 🙄

reviews.review_header: Skin felt super soft after using

Then wait 5- 10 min and wash with warm water, I scrub my face with it as I'm rinsing off. After my skin feels tight and clean!
Left my skin feeling very moisturized and it was a crazy fun process to do. Especially with my sister. Would add photo but it’s too crazy.

reviews.review_header: It does get tingly and somewhat itchy but nothing too bad. Face is clean and smooth after with no ...

I use two little scoops of the product and lathered my face, leave on for 5mins. Let it do its magic and wip off with a warm cloth!! The feeling is amazing. It makes my face feel refreshed, like it fizzed away all my blemishes.

The bubbles do kinda form quickly but nevertheless I keep it on for 5 mins and afterwards I massage it out on my face and wipe it off with a towel cloth and warm water. reviews.review_header: Just go ahead and buy this, you'll love it!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff. I have tried a ton of different face masks over the years but not a single one of them has left me this impressed. This stuff is fairly inexpensive, comes in a large container so you can do multiple applications, and goes to work in seconds. Plus the whole mask only takes about 5 minutes so it is perfect for someone who wants a little pampering but doesn't have a ton of time to waste. I love it! I love the foaming action it gives and it left my skin feeling super soft and incredibly clean. I even went the next day without makeup and had three different people (which is a lot for me seeing as I work in a small office) comment on how great my skin looked! Buy this stuff, use it, love it, throw all your other masks away. Pro tip: at the end of the 5 minute bubbling time, rub the mask in with your fingers, kinda like you would normally wash your face. This helps it become a little more effective and really delivers a final "push" to get all the dirt and grime off your face. Hope y'all enjoy!

reviews.review_header: This stuff rocks! Seriously though, if you can ...

reviews.review_header: Original product is great, but be careful with the sellers!
reviews.review_text: The first time I ordered this product, I fell in love. It isn't going to solve all your skin issues (ugh, hormones), but it did leave my skin soft with a lot more of an even tone. It has even calmed some of the more painful, cystic acne I've had. Way more than I get from the standard mask. It is a struggle to wash this off in the sink (bubbles everywhere!), but fun to wear in the meantime. I ended up buying another jar immediately. Learn from my mistake: WATCH THE SELLER.I didn't notice I wasn't buying from Elizavecca the second time around (until it was too late). The jar that arrived was green-hued. The product inside was sort of green-hued (not the blue/grey I originally had). It took a half hour to "kind of" bubble up when I finally got up the nerve to test it. My skin hadn't changed. This was a far cry from the actual product I originally received. The second jar was such a disappointment that I am hesitant to buy another.

I used the spatula to quickly applythe clay on my face and then massaged a little on face with fingers in circular motion. Kept it for about 20-25 minutes and washed it off with warm water and cold water after. I saw many comments saying it was a hassle to take it out but I didnt have any problem. I figured that was may be cause I didn't use a lot of clay and I also massaged it making it a thinner layer. Anyways, my face felt softer and pored did appear a little smaller. I LOVE THIS STUFF!! I have somewhat "sensitive skin", mostly I mean it drys out easily when I use mask products. I've been looking for a replacement for my favorite mask, Nu Skin's Epoch mask. I always loved it, it's scent free, but it's kinda spendy and it did dry my skin a little. For about the past month I've gone off all migraine prescription meds and have been trying cannabis for my migraines. I have a few methods, but one is a cannabis balm/salve that I can put on my forehead and temples. It does help. But it's "fat based", because that's how your body absorbs cannabinoids, though fat cells. So even though it works, when I have a bad migraine and use it multiple times. It is oily. This made my need to find a new mask product greater! (In unrelated advice, if you're stuck on topamax and imitrex or zomig for migraines, I suggest getting off of it. They cause so many rebound headaches, and those medications aren't good for you. I've noticed so many small changes in my body, skin, hair, and teeth since I got off those meds. Not to mention LESS headaches, I do get migraines but all those medications CAUSE more rebound headaches.) So back to this amazing mask! I am on the other side of a severe 2 day migraine. I got up this morning, feeling better, also looking like I've been to hell and back. I ate breakfast, had some coffee. I used this mask, because like I said my forehead was greasy. I don't want to get clogged pores! My skin looks amazing! It's my second time using this product. My skin is so soft and smooth. Pores teeny. I LOVE that there is a light scent, but it's hardly noticeable. Another brand i tried from amazon "Deep Sea Mud Mask" was so scented I couldn't stand it. This happy pig mask doesn't dry my skin out AT ALL. The first time I waited a while to moisturize, because I wanted to see if my skin was dried out. NOPE. No dry flaky looking skin. My only complaint is the directions are in Korean (maybe?!) so I did watch a youtube video to make sure I used it right.

reviews.review_header: Amazing stuff! Leaves skin completely clean AND even!! Blemishes gone!
reviews.review_text: Love! After applying it only once, I knew this was good stuff and have been telling all my friends and family about it. I originally heard about this product through a Facebook video ad - looked it up on Amazon and with all the amazing reviews and price, what did I have to lose? The container itself is really small - a bit disappointing in size but when applying the clay to my face, I hardly used very much. Probably used a portion size similar to a grape. I think the container could provide around 20-30 uses. As far as the product itself - it starts to bubble pretty quickly after applying so you need to be quick. Once it was applied, I left it on for nearly five minutes as it began to bubble over. One thing I wasn't prepared for was the bubbles slightly tickling the face; kind of makes you want to itch but it's really no big deal. The Facebook video ad I watched, the girl popped all the bubbles by lightly pressing on the them and then massaged the clay on her face to look like a real clay mask (I of coarse did this - also side note, the container and packaging have no english instructions what so ever so the Facebook ad served as great instructions). Massaging the left over clay on my face felt great! Velvety. I left it on for another 3 minutes and then finally washed it off. The clay definitely left my face feeling squeaky clean. All my pores looked clean and most importantly minimized. I tend to be on the slightly oily side in skin (no acne issues - an occasional zit or pimple and a few black heads but that's really just occasional) - after my skin started to dry, it started to feel pretty tight (so slightly drying). I used a thick moisturizer and left my skin alone all day. On my way to bed, I went to the bathroom to brush my teeth and literally took a double take in the mirror wondering if I had applied foundation earlier that day - my skin looked flawless! I occasionally have blemishes under my eyes/cheeks but my skin was completely even! I don't think I have ever used a product that has brought instant and amazing results like this - totally recommend it!!!

reviews.review_header: Works Great When You Follow the Instructions
reviews.review_text: First of all, I think a lot of people are using this incorrectly. There are English instructions on the box my mask came in but my Korean mother translated the actual jar for me. It says to take some product out, mix with a little warm water, wait for it to foam and bubble for 3 - 5 minutes, THEN massage it into your skin. I did this incorrectly the first time and saw very little change. A few days later I followed the right instructions and saw a dramatic difference. My large pores appeared clean and smaller. My oily skin was refreshed and not dried out. It does tingle but the instructions say to test before use to test for any allergic reactions. After following the instructions properly, I can say this product worked for me and I am loving my skin after using it.

Happy with it

Putting it on was the worst part, next to taking it off. But that's every clay mask you use. You have this spatula and you're using it to smear the mask on your face, which has the consistency of pudding. I did my nose first because I knew that was the trouble spot, but it was like instant when it started foaming. Then again, it was pretty warm because of the sun when I was walking home with it, so I'll give that the benefit of the doubt. My face feels softer, especially my nose. The sides of my nose aren't as clear as when I use the Bioré charcoal face scrub in the shower, though. However, this mask did dry up the acne I did have, so now they're not much trouble :) I used a little too much on my top lip because when it foamed to max capacity it was going in my nose. Don't use too little because it'll just dry and not do anything; use too much and you're a foam monster LOL But like the other scrub, when I took it off (with multiple paper towels), my face was red. Once it was off for a few minutes it was back to normal so nothing to be worried about. Though I was surprised that I felt no burning sensation like I usually do with the other. You may have to wash off your face multiple times to make sure you got it all off; appearances are deceiving and when a part of your face is still sticky you'll know. Overall, I am very pleased with it. It's a fun way to pamper yourself when you're having a bad day and the results make you feel (and look) good :)

reviews.review_text: LOve it! Laugh while you use it, and makes skin so soft after the first use!

I LOVE this product! First, it's fun. It's a great product to use if you have your friends staying the night, you're cheering up a girlfriend, or you're bonding with your mom. Everyone gets a kick out of it. It spreads over nicely and immediately starts bubbling up; a little goes a long way with this. It's great with light makeup removal - it's recommended that you use this product with an unwet, uncleansed face. I personally wouldn't use it while you've still got heavy makeup on, but a light cleansing beforehand would be enough; this product will get the rest of the stuff off. Once you apply it, you spread the product over your face, avoiding your eyes, mouth, and I like to avoid my nostrils. The product will begin bubbling almost immediately, but reaches peak bubbling after about 5-10 minutes. Because this product bubbles, it expands past where you initially placed it on your face. For this reason, keep the product further from your eyes/eyelashes than you would with other masks. It's fairly easy to wash off with cool water, but it does take a few minutes since the product doesn't dry completely like other cream masks might. I just stand over the sink or get in the shower afterwards to wash it all off. Makes your skin feel VERY clean and helps tremendously with blackheads and helps my pores a little. Doesn't do anything for deep zits, whiteheads, scarring, etc...So if your problem is big pores and blackheads, this product will be great. It's not harsh, and doesn't leave my face feeling extremely tight like other clay masks. The bubbles DO get a little ticklish/itchy while they're forming. The smell is light and pleasant. It's got a goopy, thick consistency...almost like pudding. A small spatula is included to scoop the product, which is super nice! A topper underneath the lid holds the spatula in place. The packaging is NOT strong - don't drop this container or you might have little grey, bubbly goop everywhere. Store this in a cool place and make sure the lid is securely on after every use - if it's loose or the topper isn't on, it will begin to bubble in the package excessively and you will lose product. Overall, a very fun and quality product for those with pore or blackhead issues.

This stuff is so ridiculously fun to use, and Snapchat worthy when it's in peak bubbling form. I literally look like a grey cloud with this on my face, or that iPhone grey moon emoji in cloud form. Picture worthiness aside, it's a product that works! My skin feels very soft and clean after I wash it off, and I recommend that this product be used before showering so that it's easier to wash off because attempting to wash it off in front of the sink took a while. I really like the spatula it comes with, it helps with applying the product evenly on the face but be sure to apply it a bit away from the nostrils and eyes because it foams up rather high; the first time I used it it blocked my nostrils with how high it foamed and got onto my lashes. Don't forget to massage the product before washing it off, it helps with removing dead skin cells and I've noticed that it re-foams afterwards which theoretically should help with lifting up and off any dead skin cells and other gunk. This product does have a scent but it's pleasant and light, I think it shouldn't be an issue for most people. I have fairly sensitive skin and I haven't experienced any skin issues with this product. Be sure to check on the Elizavecca website if the product you receive is a legit product or not, there's a sticker on the packaging with a scratch off bar that will reveal a code to type in. Their website is a little confusing to navigate and very cluttered, but even with zero knowledge of Korean I was able to find the verification page.

reviews.review_header: Might work well for others, but not for me.
reviews.review_text: For skin care, different products work/don't work for different people of different skin types. Although this was a super fun product to use, it did not work out for me. Like so many people, I had to get this for the fun factor. I have normal to dry skin. After cleansing, I quickly applied the product all over my face. I could feel it bubbling on my face. It neither tickled nor hurt. It felt like I was "sweating a lot". After 5 minutes, I looked like Papa Smurf. This is the most amusing skin care product I have every used. BUT, it took forever to wash it off my face. Almost like washing your hands with a super slimy soap that you can't get off. It's probably better if you use a face towel. After drying my face, I noticed that not was I left with dry skin, but it was accompanied by micro red bumps on my face. They weren't super red, but definitely noticeable. As fun as it is to use, this is not something that I would ever touch again. This is not to say that it wouldn't work for others. There are many good reviews so give it a try.

reviews.review_header: Very fun and very effective but hard to remove
reviews.review_text: This is one fun product that I will continue to buy until I find something else this fun. You don't need to cleanse beforehand, you just put this on with the spatula and spread it on your face. Remember that the more exposure to air the jar gets the more it will expire so be quick with that application! Do not get this anywhere below your nose or near your eyes because it foams up and gets huge. You look like an angry grey cloud and you'll be even more angry if this gets up your nose or in your eyes. It does itch on occasion and that can be super weird to deal with just persevere! Once the mask is done bubbling and looks deflated then you rub it all over your face until it isn't that spreadable. Now here comes the most irritating part: washing it off. Washing this puppy off takes time and work because the second you add water and the whole thing becomes a sticky foaming cleanser. You have to constantly do multiple rounds of rinsing to get this fully off your face but it is so worth it. My skin feels and looks fantastic after using this and the blackheads seem to be completely gone or missing which is great! It's super fun to do with your friends and it works very well! I'd buy again.

Super fun to use, the bubbles take some getting used to! I even got my husband to do it with me, although he couldn't take the bubble feeling I thought it was cool. You're supposed to leave it in for about 5-10 min, and then massage into your face and then wash off. I read that it was difficult to wash off so my husband hopped in the shower and I used a wash cloth. Using a cloth made it simple, and my face felt great after!
Love this! A little goes a long way too ☺️ Such a fun mask!

reviews.review_header: LOVE this product! First time using Facial Products
reviews.review_text: Received this in the mail last night, I could not wait to try it! I've watched so many videos and not only did they say it left your skin feeling so soft but it looked fun too! I have never used any facial products. So this being my first was fun and I couldn't be happier. I had a hard time opening it, but my husband got it open quickly so it could just have been me not knowing how. After putting it on my face right away it starts working so I have to be quick to smooth it on all around my face. The only TIP I have, and again this could just be me because it was my first time, do not put it so close to your eyes. My eyes were kind of burning although nothing got in them. I put the mask too close to my eyes. I could feel it working, my face felt like it was not burning but something was going on. It didn't hurt but it was different. Washing it off took me a while but once I had it off OMG my face felt amazing. I kept making my husband touch it because it was just so smooth. Love this product! Cannot wait to try it again.

reviews.review_header: This is a very fun skincare product
reviews.review_text: This is a very fun skincare product! (Make sure to keep closed when not using- WILL FOAM UP IN CONTAINER) My partner and I both decided to give it a go. His skin is not sensitive, my skin is and easily gets irritated. I've used this product multiple times and am happy to report, no skin irritation! I do find the smell something I need to get used to. The first time, the smell was overpowering. I tend to use it once every few weeks (mostly because I'm lazy and have other products I love) and I've grown to mostly enjoy the smell. My partner liked the scent right away. After this is a carbonated mask, it does BUBBLE UP. It goes on kind of goopy and then foams up quite fast, in my opinion. BE CAREFUL of your eyes and nose. Foams up enough to intrude those areas if you put it close by. The feeling of it actually bubbling up is ticklish. My partner barely lasted five minutes before he had to wash it off. I lasted to about ten minutes. FUN THING. You can actually rub it back to a smooth consistency AFTER it foams up... and then it will foam back up. After washing off the mask (which can take a minute or two), my skin felt awesome. It had a nice glow to it and felt so smooth and nice. All in all, fun and awesome product. I even purchased one for a gift for my sister. SHE LOVES IT.
Its probably the best mask I've ever gotten. My face was soo smooth & clean after I washed it off. The bubbles were fun & it smelled great! Will definitely be buying this again!

Super fun mask! Gets bubbly and tingly almost immediately. However, I do have sensitive skin, so it made my face a bit dry and a little itchy ( it is clay, afterall). Maybe tred lightly if you're on the sensitive side as well.

I read reviews of this product but was still a little skepticle, but thought I would give it a try. First off, it's just so much fun! It bubbles up quite a bit, so be sure to leave room around eyes, nose, etc. Aside from that it left my skin feeling so clean and smooth. Very impressed! I will absolutely purchase again when this runs out and I'm looking forward to trying more from this brand.

This is an inexpensive mask, so I did not have high expectations when buying this. The mask bubbles on your face, but if you have ever used a bubble/carbonated mask before, this one is underwhelming. The best part about carbonated masks is feeling tons of bubbles "pop" on your skin, but with this mask you do not feel them. This is a clay mask, so it just feels like the mask is too heavy for you to feel any bubble action. I will say that my skin felt ok after using this product. My pores shrunk a bit and my skin felt tighter, though very dry. It feels like there is a lot of soap/detergent in it. It does a good job at cleansing your face. This is one of those masks that takes forever to wash off (most clay masks do). It gets everywhere and makes a mess. The results are definitely not worth the cleanup.I only gave it three stars because you can't feel the bubbles popping on your skin, and because it was very drying. I just think there are so many better masks out there.

This was one of those "sure why not" impromptu purchases. I think this product is more of a fun gimmick than anything else. In what recent study did we find that fizz is good for the skin? Not sure, but I'll admit it's neat when it fluffs out. It scares my husband every time too, so there's that. It doesn't do much else, though. I have very oily skin with large pores and frequent acne, and I didn't find that it made my skin super smooth or anything. It's a pain to put on because it starts bubbling seconds after you start spreading it on your face, it tickles like mad, and it's hard to clean off. If you're someone with bad skin looking for a mask to help, you should look elsewhere. If your skin is nice and you want a fun, different mask once in awhile, then this one is kinda fun.

This mask works wonders for oily skin! I love how it feels when it bubbles up. But to answer questions. Yes it does bubble up faster depending on how oily your face it when applying it. And Yes it does itch alot when it bubbles but after that your face feels so refreshed and clean. I would recommend a face moisturizer if your skin gets to dry because it literally gets rid of all your oils. I work part time at a pizza shop and my face is naturally oily already but with the grease an oils there it makes my face super oily and when I applied it I didnt wash my face so it started working immediately. Its a fast acting mask so when you apply it id say to work slightly faster then with other masks. Also. When you wash it off it is EXTREMELY soapy and you dont wanna get it in your mouth lol it tastes bad. But it does have a nice scent and yes after applying the product some of the product will bibble up in the container but its okay cause its just reacting from the oils on the applicator that you used while dipping it back into the container. Other than that its a great product and I wish I could rate it more than five stars. So I highly recommend it to other people who have oily skin and like a refrest feeling after a face mask. No pain all gain!

I first heard about this face mask on Facebook, a video of this girl applying it and talking about this product went viral and I decided I had to try it, it looked too fun. For starters, this mask is REALLY fun to apply. It comes out like a think clay (as the label states) and once exposed to oxygen in the air it starts bubbling up so you do have to apply it really fast before it starts bubbling. Once the mask has completely bubbled you massage it a bit more in the skin and then wash it off. Playing with the bubbles was fun cause I'm a dork haha. This product smells really good too so thats another pro. The only reason why I rated it 4 out of 5 starts is because this mask is supposed to do many things but a few are lightening up dark circles and attacking white/black heads. Its supposed to deep clean and get rid of problem areas on the skin. I felt as if my face was super duper clean after I used it but my black heads/ white heads remained the same and ive used this product many times now and still the same result. So it didn't feel that it did did cleaning but did make my face feel soft like a babies bum and clean at the surface. Overall, this product is so unique and cool and I would buy it again.

I've done this a bunch of ways, but the best is to: layer it pre-shower let it foam for about 10min get in shower and shampoo hair without washing off the foam work the foam into face without rinsing all of it off keep shampooing hair work the rest of the foam on your face rinse hair and apply your usual face wash onto the left over mask that's still on your face then finish up your shower. This way works best for me and my stubborn blackheads because the steam in my shower opens up all the pores and it continues to clean my pores throughout my whole shower. Doing the mask post-shower didn't work for me as well. Also: Much better than the dead sea mask from Pure Body Naturals!

I bought it for curiosity's sake and was delighted with the results. In all honesty, I rather hate the carbonated effect of the mask; it doesn't irritate my skin or burn, it "tickles" and makes me wanna scratch my nose and face instead of giggling or whatever. But it's a very minor inconvenience. However, the performance of this mask has done wonders for me. For about two years, my left cheek suddenly broke out really badly and left me with constant new blemishes and scars (and a terrible lack of confidence), but after using this maybe 3 times a week for about a month, I've noticed and felt such a difference. My pimples and zits have died down, only reappearing after a lazy night every now and then like how it used to be. My cheek is flatter, no more raised bumps and uncomfortable textured makeup. My foundation sits smooth on my improved skin and I'm in love with this mask. If they had this mask in a noncarbonated form, I'd throw all my money at it. I'll definitely be repurchasing regardless, though.

reviews.review_header: Yuss, my face is so clean.
reviews.review_text: I have found the mask for my skin!! I have acne prone skin and it's quite dry, so you can imagine what mess I deal with :( However, after reading reviews I was relieved to read that no one had breakouts, so of course, I went ahead and bought this product. I used it already and have seen a difference in my skin. No, my acne did not disappear, but much of my redness and some cystic acne did go away! Also, my nose is literally so nice and clean now. Wow. My best friend commented on my skin saying that it looked "clean", so I'm pretty sure this mask has done something! Now, please use this mask for no more than 5 minutes and massage it in for 2 minutes, then remove by washing your face. Don't remove it immediately after it bubbles up, that's not how it works. Believe me, if you've read reviews by Korean users, that's exactly how they recommend using it for the product's effectiveness. Individuals who remove it with a washcloth, I mean go ahead, but it's better to remove it by washing it off to prevent further micro exfoliation that causes redness and irritation. It's a great mask overall if you don't mind the feeling of your face being tickled and you wanting to scratch your face. It's worth it and I recommend it! :)

It's a pain in the butt to wash off if you just go the water route...it makes it kind of slimy and just move all over the place, without really leaving your face. My face always feels super soft after using it. DON'T FORGET IT'S ON YOUR FACE FOR 20 MINUTES! lol I just did this tonight, and got sucked into my book...and it was a little harder to wash off than normal because it can get a little crusty. Oops!

This stuff is too hilarious. It bubbles on contact with oil, which means that, as it sits on your face, it tickles you with tons of tiny bubbles. My son (3) thinks it's fantastic. "What's that on your face?" he laughs. I laugh too, because it's goofy. In the jar, it's kind of like sticky Silly Putty - it's shiny and goopy. A little goes a long way, and it does come with an internal lid and plastic spatula for scooping some out. I really love that about Asian beauty products - no sticking your fingers right into the jar here, no indeed. It feels a bit sticky going on, and I actually find it a bit stubborn to remove. I prefer to rinse in the shower versus at the sink, because it just takes a little too much water and elbow grease. As part of a three-step pore cleanse, it's been pretty effective for me; no complaints here. The main reason I give four stars rather than five is how hard it is to rinse off. Kind of a downer at the end of a really fun experience.

reviews.review_text: I was wary of this product because I have terribly sensitive skin. Almost anything with irritate the skin on my face, even when it says that it is especially for sensitive skin. The reviews said that there would be some tingling and/or burning, so I almost passed on this golden opportunity. I love this stuff. My skin feels AMAZING after using this. And this product is what has convinced me to try even more korean skincare products. I think that it is all in moderation. Once the mask bubbles up, I wait for it to begin to tingle. I rub the bubbles out and then rinse off. It is a bit difficult to rise, like any other clay mask, but plain water works just fine. Make sure to moisturize well after use, as it may be drying if you don't.

Which also makes me love the price! You can buy masks at makeup stores for ten times the price that last for two uses and that's ridiculous.. Also note that when putting this on your face, once you have your scoop make sure to close the lid up again since being exposed to light and air is what makes it wanna start bubbling! And I've read that it will keep best stored in a darker cupboard/closet fyi

reviews.review_header: Leaves skin feeling soft and smooth
reviews.review_text: Everyone has been raving about this product so of course I had to try it. It took a long time to get but it was worth the wait. The packaging it adorable as well the product. The cream itself it a thick, grey gel like paste. It comes with a little white spatula to apply the product to your face so it doesn't get all over your hands. It is really cold to apply but feels great. As soon as you start putting it on it starts foaming up on your face. You don't want to leave the lid off your product too long because it will start foaming up in the container. You leave the mask on for 5-10 minutes and let it do its thing. It starts to tickle after a few minutes. After its been on for 5 minutes or more you run it in and run the bubbles away. This turns it back into a clay mask. It will start foaming up again after that but not as much. Then wash the mask off with water. I found jumping in the shower is better because it soaps up while you're washing it off. Afterwards, my skin felt so nice and soft. I use it 2 to 3 times a week. I even got my boyfriend to try it.

reviews.review_header: I have rather oily skin and I love charcoal products to begin with
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 2 months now. I have rather oily skin and I love charcoal products to begin with. I really love this mask, it is fun and fairly easy to use. I know some reviewers have said that it is a little difficult to rinse off. I usually put it on 5 minutes before I am going to hop in the shower. Once you pat the bubbles down, if you massage the....goop? into your face it will lather up and kind of working into the consistency of face wash, which I find a lot easier to remove. I defiantly find that my face is less oily for several days after using the mask, which I use once a week. I do not have sensitive skin, but I have accidently left this product on my face longer (15 minutes) then the recommended time frame of 5 minutes. (random phone calls with people who wont shut up) my face did start to burn and tingle more then usual, but once I rinsed it off there was no redness or irritation and I went on with me life. I would recommend to anyone with oil skin. and I would / will purchase again!

The mask is from South Korea so there's no English on the packing, INSTRUCTIONS: So put the mask on a clean face, leave on for 15 mins and rinse off (as time passes the mask gets foamy), but it's difficult to rinse off.
